localised_description.last_approved_text: Phakth is pleased with his tribute. As the knife strikes home and the Norscan exhales his last, a glow suffuses Settra's troop, and a bright beam pierces the firmament, highlighting a point of land far-distant. A Liche Priest produces a map and marks the destination.

incidents.localised_description: Phakth is pleased with his tribute. As the knife strikes home and the Norscan exhales his last, a glow suffuses Settra's troop, and a bright beam pierces the firmament, highlighting a point of land far-distant. A Liche Priest produces a map and marks the destination.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Sacrifice the barbarian to Phakth, the God of Justice, and request a boon.

incidents.localised_title: Sacrifice the barbarian to Phakth, the God of Justice, and request a boon.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Liche Priests bend to their work. As the Norscan is swiftly denuded, he babbles the source of his wealth: Ice Tooth Mountain. His outsize skeleton is soon back on its feet, an impressive specimen indeed. Settra commands it to lead the way to his crown's resting-place.

incidents.localised_description: The Liche Priests bend to their work. As the Norscan is swiftly denuded, he babbles the source of his wealth: Ice Tooth Mountain. His outsize skeleton is soon back on its feet, an impressive specimen indeed. Settra commands it to lead the way to his crown's resting-place.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Flay the flesh from his bones and press him into eternal service.

incidents.localised_title: Flay the flesh from his bones and press him into eternal service.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the agent descends into the tomb, the sounds of battle ring out. A band of Lizardmen is locked in mortal combat with a host of crypt-horrors, and they are losing. As the Undead begin to overwhelm the reptiles, the agent spots a standard-bearer scurrying for the entrance with a clanking sack of relics on his back. He slays the creature and takes the trove. Surveying the limits of the chamber, he also realises that Alcadizaar's sarcophagus is missing. Hefting the sack, he exits the tomb and sets out to rendezvous with Arkhan.

incidents.localised_description: As the agent descends into the tomb, the sounds of battle ring out. A band of Lizardmen is locked in mortal combat with a host of crypt-horrors, and they are losing. As the Undead begin to overwhelm the reptiles, the agent spots a standard-bearer scurrying for the entrance with a clanking sack of relics on his back. He slays the creature and takes the trove. Surveying the limits of the chamber, he also realises that Alcadizaar's sarcophagus is missing. Hefting the sack, he exits the tomb and sets out to rendezvous with Arkhan.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The agent hovers at the entrance until the clamour dies down, then steals inside to witness a scene of devastation. Lizardmen corpses litter the main chamber, but the Crypt Horrors have returned to their swaying, quiescent state. Sensing some kinship with the agent perhaps, they do not attack, but point mournfully toward an alcove where clearly a fine sarcophagus once lay. Alcadizaar's coffin has been spirited away. Tearing a symbol from the tunic of a dead Lizardman, your agent sets out to bring Arkhan the news. \n\n Arkhan is beside himself with anger. What could the perfidious Lizardmen want with Alcadizaar's remains? He smells some species of dark scheme afoot, and demands the Liche Priests bring him news of these interlopers. Through divine communion, the Scavenger-God Ualatp reveals to them the location of the looters. Arkhan wastes no time, and sets out with his army to wrest Alcadizaar's remains from the Lizardmen.

incidents.localised_description: The agent hovers at the entrance until the clamour dies down, then steals inside to witness a scene of devastation. Lizardmen corpses litter the main chamber, but the Crypt Horrors have returned to their swaying, quiescent state. Sensing some kinship with the agent perhaps, they do not attack, but point mournfully toward an alcove where clearly a fine sarcophagus once lay. Alcadizaar's coffin has been spirited away. Tearing a symbol from the tunic of a dead Lizardman, your agent sets out to bring Arkhan the news. \n\n Arkhan is beside himself with anger. What could the perfidious Lizardmen want with Alcadizaar's remains? He smells some species of dark scheme afoot, and demands the Liche Priests bring him news of these interlopers. Through divine communion, the Scavenger-God Ualatp reveals to them the location of the looters. Arkhan wastes no time, and sets out with his army to wrest Alcadizaar's remains from the Lizardmen.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Now that the Books of Nagash are in your grasp, the Great Necromancer’s immense source of power is yours to wield. On the battlefield, your enemies will wither and die before your unstoppable legions. To battle – to conquest, in life, death, Unlife and beyond!

incidents.localised_description: Now that the Books of Nagash are in your grasp, the Great Necromancer’s immense source of power is yours to wield. On the battlefield, your enemies will wither and die before your unstoppable legions. To battle – to conquest, in life, death, Unlife and beyond!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Uttering the dark litanies contained with the third Book of Nagash has caused a furious, swirling sandstorm to come into existence. Now it threatens to consume all in its path – even the Liche Priests’ death magic cannot hold back the savagery of the elements this time!

incidents.localised_description: Uttering the dark litanies contained with the third Book of Nagash has caused a furious, swirling sandstorm to come into existence. Now it threatens to consume all in its path – even the Liche Priests’ death magic cannot hold back the savagery of the elements this time!

As the knife strikes home and the Norscan exhales his last, a glow suffuses Settra's troop, and a bright beam pierces the firmament, highlighting a point of land far-distant. A Liche Priest produces a map and marks the destination.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Bretonnian crusaders have returned home bearing the remains of King Amanhotep at the head of their army, foolishly believing him to be one of their own nobles. Upon his awakening, the Tomb King slaughtered entire towns before returning to his rest. We should capitalise on the disorder and use this opportunity to strike!

incidents.localised_description: Bretonnian crusaders have returned home bearing the remains of King Amanhotep at the head of their army, foolishly believing him to be one of their own nobles. Upon his awakening, the Tomb King slaughtered entire towns before returning to his rest. We should capitalise on the disorder and use this opportunity to strike!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those half-sized men have devised a primitive yet highly-effective weapon. The pots of fiery liquid thrown at our forces burn through both armour and bones alike - we should be weary of this strange, new technology.

incidents.localised_description: Those half-sized men have devised a primitive yet highly-effective weapon. The pots of fiery liquid thrown at our forces burn through both armour and bones alike - we should be weary of this strange, new technology.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A wondrous cache of arrows has been discovered, brimming with the power of Asaph, the Goddess of Beauty, Magic and Vengeance! We should arm our archers with this blessed ordnance and send our enemies a rain of death!

incidents.localised_description: A wondrous cache of arrows has been discovered, brimming with the power of Asaph, the Goddess of Beauty, Magic and Vengeance! We should arm our archers with this blessed ordnance and send our enemies a rain of death!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our Liche Priests have seen into the wondrous Realm of Souls, but report that what they have seen there is not what we were promised; ruins and decay plague their visions. Perhaps this is a warning?

incidents.localised_description: Our Liche Priests have seen into the wondrous Realm of Souls, but report that what they have seen there is not what we were promised; ruins and decay plague their visions. Perhaps this is a warning?

localised_title.last_approved_text: A Glimpse into the Realm of Souls

incidents.localised_title: A Glimpse into the Realm of Souls

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whilst travelling through Lustria's jungles, one of our regiments has been attacked by a band of warrior-women who moved silently through the trees before disappearing again as swiftly as they appeared. We should proceed with caution.

incidents.localised_description: Whilst travelling through Lustria's jungles, one of our regiments has been attacked by a band of warrior-women who moved silently through the trees before disappearing again as swiftly as they appeared. We should proceed with caution.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Rapid expansion combined with heavy precipitation has turned the ground surrounding our city walls to quicksand; anyone who passes over it is swallowed by the desert! Although such a thing cannot harm the Unliving, our enemies will struggle to fight us as they are slowly consumed by the sands!

incidents.localised_description: Rapid expansion combined with heavy precipitation has turned the ground surrounding our city walls to quicksand; anyone who passes over it is swallowed by the desert! Although such a thing cannot harm the Unliving, our enemies will struggle to fight us as they are slowly consumed by the sands!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Their sad lament over lifetimes spent and lost has driven our Undead Lords into a furious frenzy! In an effort to quell the feelings of anger and loss, many of their servants are set to work performing tasks that only the living need undertake.

incidents.localised_description: Their sad lament over lifetimes spent and lost has driven our Undead Lords into a furious frenzy! In an effort to quell the feelings of anger and loss, many of their servants are set to work performing tasks that only the living need undertake.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is talk of entire armies who fight without a cause of their own, instead offering their services in return for payment in gold! Such soldiers cannot be trusted - we must ensure they are not used against us!

incidents.localised_description: There is talk of entire armies who fight without a cause of their own, instead offering their services in return for payment in gold! Such soldiers cannot be trusted - we must ensure they are not used against us!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Up in the mountains, a volcano has erupted, raining molten fire down on our army. Many units have been reduced to ashes amongst the sand - we should move quickly yet cautiously through this infernal land!

incidents.localised_description: Up in the mountains, a volcano has erupted, raining molten fire down on our army. Many units have been reduced to ashes amongst the sand - we should move quickly yet cautiously through this infernal land!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our scouts have located a vast graveyard containing the graves of many fine warhorses. The bones are well preserved and may still be strong enough to serve us - we should raise these creatures from their slumber to strengthen our cavalry even further.

incidents.localised_description: Our scouts have located a vast graveyard containing the graves of many fine warhorses. The bones are well preserved and may still be strong enough to serve us - we should raise these creatures from their slumber to strengthen our cavalry even further.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rumour has reached us, from far across the sea, that a Vampire has located a chamber of untold power, deep within Lustria. Although he failed to harvest its power for his own Unliving ends, the chamber collapsed, releasing the magic trapped within!

incidents.localised_description: A rumour has reached us, from far across the sea, that a Vampire has located a chamber of untold power, deep within Lustria. Although he failed to harvest its power for his own Unliving ends, the chamber collapsed, releasing the magic trapped within!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whilst excavating the Tomb City of Lybaras, our slave workers have uncovered scrolls detailing tactics, formations and manoeuvres not used for hundreds of years. There is much to be learned from this ancient way of battle - our enemies will be surprised when they die!

incidents.localised_description: Whilst excavating the Tomb City of Lybaras, our slave workers have uncovered scrolls detailing tactics, formations and manoeuvres not used for hundreds of years. There is much to be learned from this ancient way of battle - our enemies will be surprised when they die!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This is not much of a find, all in all - your troops have no need of these second-rate weapons, that may crumble when used in anger.

incidents.localised_description: This is not much of a find, all in all - your troops have no need of these second-rate weapons, that may crumble when used in anger.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There's some really fine pieces here! After taking a few that take your fancy, your warriors take their pick of the remainder. Pleased, they pledge to fight with renewed fervour.

incidents.localised_description: There's some really fine pieces here! After taking a few that take your fancy, your warriors take their pick of the remainder. Pleased, they pledge to fight with renewed fervour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Having seen you cherry-pick the best pieces for yourself, your warriors are less than impressed with the leftovers; the brittle blades break on impact and the shields splinter when touched.

incidents.localised_description: Having seen you cherry-pick the best pieces for yourself, your warriors are less than impressed with the leftovers; the brittle blades break on impact and the shields splinter when touched.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Thinking laterally, you realise that, although your own troops are well supplied, your allies who would find these weapons useful in their struggles against the foe.

incidents.localised_description: Thinking laterally, you realise that, although your own troops are well supplied, your allies who would find these weapons useful in their struggles against the foe.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Possibly, you've misjudged your allies - they scoff at the poorly made weapons and begin to question your integrity. Sometimes, a good deed is its own punishment.

incidents.localised_description: Possibly, you've misjudged your allies - they scoff at the poorly made weapons and begin to question your integrity. Sometimes, a good deed is its own punishment.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Weapons? We can forge finer blades ourselves. Beyond the barracks lies an untouched temple, offerings to the gods still littered about it. This is the reason why we came here.

incidents.localised_description: Weapons? We can forge finer blades ourselves. Beyond the barracks lies an untouched temple, offerings to the gods still littered about it. This is the reason why we came here.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Weapons? We can forge finer blades ourselves. It would appear that they are the only treasure to be found here - a thorough search of the city reveals nothing of any real value.

incidents.localised_description: Weapons? We can forge finer blades ourselves. It would appear that they are the only treasure to be found here - a thorough search of the city reveals nothing of any real value.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The dead are best left that way; disturbing corpses is never a good idea. You leave the battlefield at once and pay it no more heed.

incidents.localised_description: The dead are best left that way; disturbing corpses is never a good idea. You leave the battlefield at once and pay it no more heed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whilst digging a grave for the bodies you find a box buried beneath the ground, inside which is the reward for your compassionate nature.

incidents.localised_description: Whilst digging a grave for the bodies you find a box buried beneath the ground, inside which is the reward for your compassionate nature.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You bury the casualties of the battle in a large, shallow grave. You briefly muse on the waste that conflict causes, before dismissing such dangerous thoughts from your mind.

incidents.localised_description: You bury the casualties of the battle in a large, shallow grave. You briefly muse on the waste that conflict causes, before dismissing such dangerous thoughts from your mind.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Most of the equipment has already been looted or destroyed by the victors. However, a corpse, half-buried in the mud, still clutches a most curious item...

incidents.localised_description: Most of the equipment has already been looted or destroyed by the victors. However, a corpse, half-buried in the mud, still clutches a most curious item...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your retainers quickly establish that the corpses have already been looted - there's nothing of value to be found here.

incidents.localised_description: Your retainers quickly establish that the corpses have already been looted - there's nothing of value to be found here.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There's a collection of what looks like Elven statues inside the warehouse. An art dealer of your acquaintance will be happy to take them off your hands for an excellent price.

incidents.localised_description: There's a collection of what looks like Elven statues inside the warehouse. An art dealer of your acquaintance will be happy to take them off your hands for an excellent price.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There's a number of what appear to be Elven statues inside the warehouse. An art dealer of your acquaintance is quick to tell you they are little more than junk, however.

incidents.localised_description: There's a number of what appear to be Elven statues inside the warehouse. An art dealer of your acquaintance is quick to tell you they are little more than junk, however.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Black Dragon could return at any moment. If it does it's reasonable to presume that you're whole party is dead. Therefore, it would be wise to not disturb the nest.

incidents.localised_description: The Black Dragon could return at any moment. If it does it's reasonable to presume that you're whole party is dead. Therefore, it would be wise to not disturb the nest.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Acting quickly, your retainers are able to take the eggs from the nest and get away safely. The trade in Dragon eggs is booming; you will make an excellent profit.

incidents.localised_description: Acting quickly, your retainers are able to take the eggs from the nest and get away safely. The trade in Dragon eggs is booming; you will make an excellent profit.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Acting quickly your retainers are able to take the eggs from the nest and get away safely. However, you are unable to sell them as no one believes they are real!

incidents.localised_description: Acting quickly your retainers are able to take the eggs from the nest and get away safely. However, you are unable to sell them as no one believes they are real!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Dragon eggs are hard to sell and dangerous to transport. Instead you search through the bones in the base of the nest and find something shining in the debris.

incidents.localised_description: Dragon eggs are hard to sell and dangerous to transport. Instead you search through the bones in the base of the nest and find something shining in the debris.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Turning from the eggs you begin your search of the nest. At that point, the Dragon returns and attacks! You manage to escape relatively unscathed, but there is a huge rend in your armour.

incidents.localised_description: Turning from the eggs you begin your search of the nest. At that point, the Dragon returns and attacks! You manage to escape relatively unscathed, but there is a huge rend in your armour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Leaving the nest you decide to search the surrounding area. Below the Dragon's nest lies a horde of treasure that must have fallen from above during a hasty, airborne escape!

incidents.localised_description: Leaving the nest you decide to search the surrounding area. Below the Dragon's nest lies a horde of treasure that must have fallen from above during a hasty, airborne escape!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Leaving the nest safely behind, you search the surrounding area but to no avail. It's time to give up on the day - maybe tomorrow will be more fruitful?

incidents.localised_description: Leaving the nest safely behind, you search the surrounding area but to no avail. It's time to give up on the day - maybe tomorrow will be more fruitful?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfholds are seldom left unguarded, so it would be unwise to try the doors. You back up slowly, in case you trigger a booby-trap left behind by a particularly sharp-witted Engineer.

incidents.localised_description: Dwarfholds are seldom left unguarded, so it would be unwise to try the doors. You back up slowly, in case you trigger a booby-trap left behind by a particularly sharp-witted Engineer.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is apparent that you have stumbled upon an abandoned Dwarf brewery. Naturally, you take the Dwarfs intoxicating ale and hold a great feast to celebrate your conquests!

incidents.localised_description: It is apparent that you have stumbled upon an abandoned Dwarf brewery. Naturally, you take the Dwarfs intoxicating ale and hold a great feast to celebrate your conquests!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rush of wind blows you backwards and there is a strange crackle in the air. You notice various runes around the room; this is a Dwarfen trap to nullify magic before it can be used against them!

incidents.localised_description: A rush of wind blows you backwards and there is a strange crackle in the air. You notice various runes around the room; this is a Dwarfen trap to nullify magic before it can be used against them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Picking the second entrance, you unlock the door and peer cautiously inside. It would appear that you've hit the jackpot - a chest of Dwarfen gold left entirely unguarded!

incidents.localised_description: Picking the second entrance, you unlock the door and peer cautiously inside. It would appear that you've hit the jackpot - a chest of Dwarfen gold left entirely unguarded!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unfortunately, as soon as you prise the door open a powder keg explodes, throwing you backwards in the blast. Although the booby-trap failed to kill you, your wounds slow progress.

incidents.localised_description: Unfortunately, as soon as you prise the door open a powder keg explodes, throwing you backwards in the blast. Although the booby-trap failed to kill you, your wounds slow progress.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ever cautious of Dwarfen ingenuity, you gently push the third door open. Inside, you find a store room bursting with valuable trade goods that can be sold or bartered.

incidents.localised_description: Ever cautious of Dwarfen ingenuity, you gently push the third door open. Inside, you find a store room bursting with valuable trade goods that can be sold or bartered.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Cautiously, knowing the Dwarfs capable of laying ingenious traps for the unwary trespasser, you open the third door... to find a room full of beard-grooming products! Bah!

incidents.localised_description: Cautiously, knowing the Dwarfs capable of laying ingenious traps for the unwary trespasser, you open the third door... to find a room full of beard-grooming products! Bah!

localised_description.last_approved_text: These are Greenskins we're talking about - it could easily be a trap! It would be best if you didn't approach the campfire and considered moving on to another ruin altogether.

incidents.localised_description: These are Greenskins we're talking about - it could easily be a trap! It would be best if you didn't approach the campfire and considered moving on to another ruin altogether.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You help the Shaman to his feet. He chants something strange, and suddenly your hands are overflowing with gold! It's almost tempting not to kill him...

incidents.localised_description: You help the Shaman to his feet. He chants something strange, and suddenly your hands are overflowing with gold! It's almost tempting not to kill him...

localised_description.last_approved_text: You help the Shaman to his feet. Bizarrely, instead of trying to kill you, he chants something strange instead, before capering off into the sunset!

incidents.localised_description: You help the Shaman to his feet. Bizarrely, instead of trying to kill you, he chants something strange instead, before capering off into the sunset!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You cautiously approach the prone Shaman and search his body. Fighting the urge to vomit, you find a few trinkets and beat a hasty retreat.

incidents.localised_description: You cautiously approach the prone Shaman and search his body. Fighting the urge to vomit, you find a few trinkets and beat a hasty retreat.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You warily approach the unconscious Shaman and search his body. The search is less than successful, and you may never feel clean again!

incidents.localised_description: You warily approach the unconscious Shaman and search his body. The search is less than successful, and you may never feel clean again!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You tie up the Shaman and interrogate him. His babbling is incomprehensible, but he does produce a magical item from the folds of his robes.

incidents.localised_description: You tie up the Shaman and interrogate him. His babbling is incomprehensible, but he does produce a magical item from the folds of his robes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: After much incoherent gibbering, you decide to cut the Shaman loose and he capers away. That turns out to be the wrong move - you soon realise that the thieving git has picked your pockets whilst making his exit!

incidents.localised_description: After much incoherent gibbering, you decide to cut the Shaman loose and he capers away. That turns out to be the wrong move - you soon realise that the thieving git has picked your pockets whilst making his exit!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is no obvious way of getting into the vault safely, let alone retrieving the armour and getting out again. Your retainers will just have to survive without it.

incidents.localised_description: There is no obvious way of getting into the vault safely, let alone retrieving the armour and getting out again. Your retainers will just have to survive without it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The armour is far too large and cumbersome to carry out of the flooded chamber without specialised equipment. However, whilst inspecting it, your men find a most interesting item.

incidents.localised_description: The armour is far too large and cumbersome to carry out of the flooded chamber without specialised equipment. However, whilst inspecting it, your men find a most interesting item.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your men quickly discover that the armour is far too heavy to retrieve from the water. After a thorough search of the vault you leave empty-handed.

incidents.localised_description: Your men quickly discover that the armour is far too heavy to retrieve from the water. After a thorough search of the vault you leave empty-handed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The armour is indeed the work of a master armourer, and it's surprisingly light too. Your retainers have no problems recovering it from the flooded vault.

incidents.localised_description: The armour is indeed the work of a master armourer, and it's surprisingly light too. Your retainers have no problems recovering it from the flooded vault.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of your retainers assures you that he has the perfect magical item for this job. The Mage enters the vault alone and soon after there is a huge explosion, burying him and the magical item deep beneath the ground.

incidents.localised_description: One of your retainers assures you that he has the perfect magical item for this job. The Mage enters the vault alone and soon after there is a huge explosion, burying him and the magical item deep beneath the ground.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Using a series of controlled demolition charges you are able to create a new chamber to drain the water away. The plan works flawlessly and you recover the high quality armour fully intact.

incidents.localised_description: Using a series of controlled demolition charges you are able to create a new chamber to drain the water away. The plan works flawlessly and you recover the high quality armour fully intact.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In an attempt to drain the chamber you accidentally trigger a cave-in; the chamber is now blocked by fallen rocks and debris. Whatever was in there is likely to remain buried, forever.

incidents.localised_description: In an attempt to drain the chamber you accidentally trigger a cave-in; the chamber is now blocked by fallen rocks and debris. Whatever was in there is likely to remain buried, forever.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Only a fool would disturb the dead. The best thing for everyone - living and dead - is that you leave. Now, without further ado.

incidents.localised_description: Only a fool would disturb the dead. The best thing for everyone - living and dead - is that you leave. Now, without further ado.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are a series of tracks leading away from the graveyard to the North. You follow them and find they lead to a cave filled with hastily-buried chests.

incidents.localised_description: There are a series of tracks leading away from the graveyard to the North. You follow them and find they lead to a cave filled with hastily-buried chests.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It seems whoever buried the bodies has long since departed and it's unlikely you'd be able to track them down now anyway.

incidents.localised_description: It seems whoever buried the bodies has long since departed and it's unlikely you'd be able to track them down now anyway.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of the corpses is bedecked in finery and still clutches his weapons. A powerful magical aura emanates from the grave.

incidents.localised_description: One of the corpses is bedecked in finery and still clutches his weapons. A powerful magical aura emanates from the grave.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the corpses are uncovered a strange miasma seeps from among the graves. You should not have disturbed the dead. Now you will pay the price!

incidents.localised_description: As the corpses are uncovered a strange miasma seeps from among the graves. You should not have disturbed the dead. Now you will pay the price!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your retainer detects a faint magical signature coming from one of the graves. You dig it up and find a corpse clutching a powerful magical item.

incidents.localised_description: Your retainer detects a faint magical signature coming from one of the graves. You dig it up and find a corpse clutching a powerful magical item.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are no traces of magic on these graves, it must've been a trick of the light and nothing more. Let the dead rest in peace.

incidents.localised_description: There are no traces of magic on these graves, it must've been a trick of the light and nothing more. Let the dead rest in peace.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While the treasures are tempting, no one in their right mind would leave them unguarded, surely?

incidents.localised_description: While the treasures are tempting, no one in their right mind would leave them unguarded, surely?

localised_description.last_approved_text: You take as many of the artefacts as you dare and run from the vault. The desire for Lustrian artifacts means you will be able to command a high price for them.

incidents.localised_description: You take as many of the artefacts as you dare and run from the vault. The desire for Lustrian artifacts means you will be able to command a high price for them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You take as many of the artefacts as you can carry and exit the vault. In the light of day you quickly realise that they are nothing more than worthless reproductions.

incidents.localised_description: You take as many of the artefacts as you can carry and exit the vault. In the light of day you quickly realise that they are nothing more than worthless reproductions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ignoring the tempting artefacts, your retainers soon find chests filled to the brim with gold, hidden at the back of the vault.

incidents.localised_description: Ignoring the tempting artefacts, your retainers soon find chests filled to the brim with gold, hidden at the back of the vault.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As your men begin their search, there is the sound of giant gears whirring into life. The entrance to the vault is suddenly blocked by a huge boulder!

incidents.localised_description: As your men begin their search, there is the sound of giant gears whirring into life. The entrance to the vault is suddenly blocked by a huge boulder!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The vault is likely riddled with traps! You cautiously back out, informing your retainers to mark the location on the map - most treasure hunters are always happy to pay for information such as this.

incidents.localised_description: The vault is likely riddled with traps! You cautiously back out, informing your retainers to mark the location on the map - most treasure hunters are always happy to pay for information such as this.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The vault is likely riddled with traps! You cautiously back out, informing your retainers to mark the location on the map. Sadly, you are unable to sell the information.

incidents.localised_description: The vault is likely riddled with traps! You cautiously back out, informing your retainers to mark the location on the map. Sadly, you are unable to sell the information.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It's best to act quickly and decisively if you want to hold on to your sanity! You burn the shrine to the ground; the embers cackle and hiss as the makeshift structure falls apart.

incidents.localised_description: It's best to act quickly and decisively if you want to hold on to your sanity! You burn the shrine to the ground; the embers cackle and hiss as the makeshift structure falls apart.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It doesn't take too long to find someone with the power and will to cleanse the taint of Chaos. They safely purge the basement, as well as several other nearby relics.

incidents.localised_description: It doesn't take too long to find someone with the power and will to cleanse the taint of Chaos. They safely purge the basement, as well as several other nearby relics.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You employ a supposed 'expert' to cleanse the shrine. However, the charlatan does little more than set it on fire and demand an extortionate fee!

incidents.localised_description: You employ a supposed 'expert' to cleanse the shrine. However, the charlatan does little more than set it on fire and demand an extortionate fee!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Some things are best left untouched. In fact, this is the very epitome of something you shouldn't touch. Sensibly, you seal the basement and leave.

incidents.localised_description: Some things are best left untouched. In fact, this is the very epitome of something you shouldn't touch. Sensibly, you seal the basement and leave.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Although you resist the corruption of Chaos, others in your party are not so strong. Weaker minds are drawn to its power and are soon prostrate before the altar, praying to Slaanesh.

incidents.localised_description: Although you resist the corruption of Chaos, others in your party are not so strong. Weaker minds are drawn to its power and are soon prostrate before the altar, praying to Slaanesh.

localised_description.last_approved_text: On closer inspection, it turns out that the shrine is extremely rudimentary and devoid of corruption. In fact, it's unlikely that Slaanesh even noticed it was built! You dismantle the altar with ease and smash the parts.

incidents.localised_description: On closer inspection, it turns out that the shrine is extremely rudimentary and devoid of corruption. In fact, it's unlikely that Slaanesh even noticed it was built! You dismantle the altar with ease and smash the parts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The power of Slaanesh is hard to resist. A tide of twisted thoughts and desires fills your head and you soon find yourself bent in prayer before the shrine of the Dark Prince.

incidents.localised_description: The power of Slaanesh is hard to resist. A tide of twisted thoughts and desires fills your head and you soon find yourself bent in prayer before the shrine of the Dark Prince.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Pushing a retainer down the tunnel ahead of you doesn't look good in front of the others, however practical. You decide not to investigate the tunnel and leave, with haste.

incidents.localised_description: Pushing a retainer down the tunnel ahead of you doesn't look good in front of the others, however practical. You decide not to investigate the tunnel and leave, with haste.

localised_description.last_approved_text: From deep within the tunnel comes a rumbling growl, followed by a strange beast that attacks without warning; battle ensues. Fortunately, you are able to slay the beast and escape unscathed.

incidents.localised_description: From deep within the tunnel comes a rumbling growl, followed by a strange beast that attacks without warning; battle ensues. Fortunately, you are able to slay the beast and escape unscathed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: From deep within the tunnel comes a deafening howl, followed by a savage, many-tentacled beast that attacks without warning. In the ensuing fight, several of your party are badly wounded but all manage to escape.

incidents.localised_description: From deep within the tunnel comes a deafening howl, followed by a savage, many-tentacled beast that attacks without warning. In the ensuing fight, several of your party are badly wounded but all manage to escape.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You ask for volunteers and soon a scouting party is deployed. They discover a hidden treasure deep within the tunnel. Although it takes awhile for them to retrieve it, the hoard proves to be well worth the wait.

incidents.localised_description: You ask for volunteers and soon a scouting party is deployed. They discover a hidden treasure deep within the tunnel. Although it takes awhile for them to retrieve it, the hoard proves to be well worth the wait.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You wait for hours, but the scouts never return; it's looking like some foul luck indeed has befallen your retainers. The rest of your party are clearly spooked, so you leave without a backward glance.

incidents.localised_description: You wait for hours, but the scouts never return; it's looking like some foul luck indeed has befallen your retainers. The rest of your party are clearly spooked, so you leave without a backward glance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Nothing good can come from exploring these tunnels, except maybe a slow, painful death as the lunch of something deeply unpleasant. You collapse the tunnel entrance and walk away.

incidents.localised_description: Nothing good can come from exploring these tunnels, except maybe a slow, painful death as the lunch of something deeply unpleasant. You collapse the tunnel entrance and walk away.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your retainers are a tad overzealous collapsing the tunnel, and some of your supplies are caught in the blast. Angered, you leave the idiots to their fate and leave the building.

incidents.localised_description: Your retainers are a tad overzealous collapsing the tunnel, and some of your supplies are caught in the blast. Angered, you leave the idiots to their fate and leave the building.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Following mysterious strangers into alleys is folly, especially when the Winds of Magic are abroad. Best to ignore the figure and back carefully down the street, with weapons drawn.

incidents.localised_description: Following mysterious strangers into alleys is folly, especially when the Winds of Magic are abroad. Best to ignore the figure and back carefully down the street, with weapons drawn.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The figure draws a sword! Although points could be awarded for suicidal bravery, the stranger clearly has no chance and is easily slain. Close inspection reveals a talisman of great power!

incidents.localised_description: The figure draws a sword! Although points could be awarded for suicidal bravery, the stranger clearly has no chance and is easily slain. Close inspection reveals a talisman of great power!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have made a mistake... the stranger is a skilful fighter who wounds you before slipping away into the night. The lesson? That you're not alone in the ruins - others seek the treasure and are prepared to kill for it.

incidents.localised_description: You have made a mistake... the stranger is a skilful fighter who wounds you before slipping away into the night. The lesson? That you're not alone in the ruins - others seek the treasure and are prepared to kill for it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You approach the hooded figure and offer a cautious greeting. It soon becomes clear that they mean no harm and could prove useful. After a short conversation they agree to join your party.

incidents.localised_description: You approach the hooded figure and offer a cautious greeting. It soon becomes clear that they mean no harm and could prove useful. After a short conversation they agree to join your party.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You approach the hooded figure and offer a cautious greeting. It soon becomes clear that they mean no harm and could prove useful. After a short conversation they agree to join your party.

incidents.localised_description: You approach the hooded figure and offer a cautious greeting. It soon becomes clear that they mean no harm and could prove useful. After a short conversation they agree to join your party.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Cautiously, you extend your hand in greeting. Fearfully, they back away; clearly, misfortune has driven the poor wretch mad - their incoherent babbling reveals nothing of value.

incidents.localised_description: Cautiously, you extend your hand in greeting. Fearfully, they back away; clearly, misfortune has driven the poor wretch mad - their incoherent babbling reveals nothing of value.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The stranger leads you around for hours without purpose or direction. Stopping for a moment, you stumble over a number of well-stocked chests. The hooded figure disappears as you rifle through them.

incidents.localised_description: The stranger leads you around for hours without purpose or direction. Stopping for a moment, you stumble over a number of well-stocked chests. The hooded figure disappears as you rifle through them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: After hours of fruitless following, the stranger finally disappears in a dead end. Realising that they must have had magical help to evade you, your patience wears thin and you give up the chase.

incidents.localised_description: After hours of fruitless following, the stranger finally disappears in a dead end. Realising that they must have had magical help to evade you, your patience wears thin and you give up the chase.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs waste their own time and that of others with such things. You have no use for their strange follies, so walk away.

incidents.localised_description: The Dwarfs waste their own time and that of others with such things. You have no use for their strange follies, so walk away.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The expert you hired is able to safely crack open the automaton and study it. It doesn't appear to serve any useful purpose but there are those willing to pay handsomely for a curio such as this.

incidents.localised_description: The expert you hired is able to safely crack open the automaton and study it. It doesn't appear to serve any useful purpose but there are those willing to pay handsomely for a curio such as this.

localised_description.last_approved_text: After a few days you still haven't heard from the expert you hired. When you send someone to investigate, they discover a corpse and bloody automaton tracks leading from the house.

incidents.localised_description: After a few days you still haven't heard from the expert you hired. When you send someone to investigate, they discover a corpse and bloody automaton tracks leading from the house.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You never work out what the purpose of the device is, but nevertheless manage to find someone willing to buy it. Oh well, there's one born every minute!

incidents.localised_description: You never work out what the purpose of the device is, but nevertheless manage to find someone willing to buy it. Oh well, there's one born every minute!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You manage to find someone willing to buy the device, but it explodes during the trade. A lucky escape - fortunately only the buyer is killed this time.

incidents.localised_description: You manage to find someone willing to buy the device, but it explodes during the trade. A lucky escape - fortunately only the buyer is killed this time.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The automaton falls over on its side and explodes, destroying a nearby wall. The explosion reveals a chest full to the brim with exactly the sort of treasure you have been seeking all along!

incidents.localised_description: The automaton falls over on its side and explodes, destroying a nearby wall. The explosion reveals a chest full to the brim with exactly the sort of treasure you have been seeking all along!

localised_description.last_approved_text: As far as you can tell the wretched thing has no purpose. You order a retainer to take the biggest axe they can find and dismember the automaton, making as much noise and mess as possible in the process.

incidents.localised_description: As far as you can tell the wretched thing has no purpose. You order a retainer to take the biggest axe they can find and dismember the automaton, making as much noise and mess as possible in the process.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Sometimes, this is how it goes. Not all hunts are successful and the wise know when they are beaten. Perhaps a fortune will present itself further down the road?

incidents.localised_description: Sometimes, this is how it goes. Not all hunts are successful and the wise know when they are beaten. Perhaps a fortune will present itself further down the road?

localised_description.last_approved_text: After a thorough search it is clear that there are no spoils to be had. You turn your attention to the tracks but it is soon obvious that they are too faded to follow.

incidents.localised_description: After a thorough search it is clear that there are no spoils to be had. You turn your attention to the tracks but it is soon obvious that they are too faded to follow.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Determined to find something, you hire a group of skilled - and expensive - treasure hunters to search through the ruins. They are soon forced to admit that they too are unable to find anything.

incidents.localised_description: Determined to find something, you hire a group of skilled - and expensive - treasure hunters to search through the ruins. They are soon forced to admit that they too are unable to find anything.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Following the tracks you come across a small band of treasure hunters encamped a short distance away, their wagons bursting with chests. You chase them off with ease and claim their haul for yourself.

incidents.localised_description: Following the tracks you come across a small band of treasure hunters encamped a short distance away, their wagons bursting with chests. You chase them off with ease and claim their haul for yourself.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The tracks are confusing and double back on themselves several times. In the bewilderment, you get turned around and eventually lose the trail altogether.

incidents.localised_description: The tracks are confusing and double back on themselves several times. In the bewilderment, you get turned around and eventually lose the trail altogether.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A travelling merchant passes through the ruins and you capture and question him. He offers useless rumours and little else. You decide to relieve him of his goods to teach him a lesson.

incidents.localised_description: A travelling merchant passes through the ruins and you capture and question him. He offers useless rumours and little else. You decide to relieve him of his goods to teach him a lesson.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You setup a makeshift barricade on the edge of the town and await for your predecessors to return. After days of fruitless waiting you finally admit defeat and leave.

incidents.localised_description: You setup a makeshift barricade on the edge of the town and await for your predecessors to return. After days of fruitless waiting you finally admit defeat and leave.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There's no reason to engage with desperate people; oft-times, such schemes come to naught anyway. You decide to leave them to their seditious talk and walk away quietly.

incidents.localised_description: There's no reason to engage with desperate people; oft-times, such schemes come to naught anyway. You decide to leave them to their seditious talk and walk away quietly.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Surprised by and failing to recognise you, they listen and agree to trade some of their excellent-looking weapons for supplies. The equipment turns out to be of superior quality.

incidents.localised_description: Surprised by and failing to recognise you, they listen and agree to trade some of their excellent-looking weapons for supplies. The equipment turns out to be of superior quality.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your friendly offer of trade breaks the ice. The dissenters agree to trade weapons for supplies. Unfortunately, their offerings are inferior, but a deal is a deal; at least the rebels are deprived of arms!

incidents.localised_description: Your friendly offer of trade breaks the ice. The dissenters agree to trade weapons for supplies. Unfortunately, their offerings are inferior, but a deal is a deal; at least the rebels are deprived of arms!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Providence has brought you here to silence these agitators afore they can act! Their screams fill the air as the barn burns to the ground. Your people feel much safer in their beds.

incidents.localised_description: Providence has brought you here to silence these agitators afore they can act! Their screams fill the air as the barn burns to the ground. Your people feel much safer in their beds.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ha! Clearly these rabble-rousers thought themselves safe to speak freely of their treachery. The barn burns to the ground and no one escapes; only the smell of charred flesh remains.

incidents.localised_description: Ha! Clearly these rabble-rousers thought themselves safe to speak freely of their treachery. The barn burns to the ground and no one escapes; only the smell of charred flesh remains.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You take the rebels completely by surprise. Overwhelmed, they surrender and turn over their weapons in return for their miserable lives. Naturally, you have them killed anyway.

incidents.localised_description: You take the rebels completely by surprise. Overwhelmed, they surrender and turn over their weapons in return for their miserable lives. Naturally, you have them killed anyway.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Entering the barn, you challenge the survivors and a stand-off ensues. Enraged by your arrogance, they refuse to surrender. Rallying together, they defame you as a tyrant.

incidents.localised_description: Entering the barn, you challenge the survivors and a stand-off ensues. Enraged by your arrogance, they refuse to surrender. Rallying together, they defame you as a tyrant.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The other party are not known to you, and they are carrying a variety of very sharp-looking weapons with them. Plunder is never worth losing your life over; you leave empty handed.

incidents.localised_description: The other party are not known to you, and they are carrying a variety of very sharp-looking weapons with them. Plunder is never worth losing your life over; you leave empty handed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You find a few discarded trinkets that may have some worth, but have the sinking feeling that the main hoard has been lost to the strangers. You win some, you lose some.

incidents.localised_description: You find a few discarded trinkets that may have some worth, but have the sinking feeling that the main hoard has been lost to the strangers. You win some, you lose some.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You don't manage to find anything of interest. It seems the strangers got here first and cleaned the place out. You curse the skies and leave.

incidents.localised_description: You don't manage to find anything of interest. It seems the strangers got here first and cleaned the place out. You curse the skies and leave.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unusually, the scavengers welcome your offer and you join them in their search. Whilst working alongside the strangers you manage to find a hidden vault of treasure. Now, if only there was a way to avoid splitting the profits with them...?

incidents.localised_description: Unusually, the scavengers welcome your offer and you join them in their search. Whilst working alongside the strangers you manage to find a hidden vault of treasure. Now, if only there was a way to avoid splitting the profits with them...?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your gut feeling was correct! You join up with the scavengers to search the ruins. However, after a few hours they disappear, along with some of your belongings!

incidents.localised_description: Your gut feeling was correct! You join up with the scavengers to search the ruins. However, after a few hours they disappear, along with some of your belongings!

localised_description.last_approved_text: At the first sign of trouble the scavengers flee, leaving all their belongings. Some beings are just not cut for high-energy, high-stakes work such as this!

incidents.localised_description: At the first sign of trouble the scavengers flee, leaving all their belongings. Some beings are just not cut for high-energy, high-stakes work such as this!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You manage to chase off the scavengers with ease. It's unfortunate, but not a total surprise to find that they hadn't located anything of value either.

incidents.localised_description: You manage to chase off the scavengers with ease. It's unfortunate, but not a total surprise to find that they hadn't located anything of value either.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Leaving well alone be may be the most sensible course of action here. It is impossible to truly kill a Daemon of Nurgle, you would only invoke its ire.

incidents.localised_description: Leaving well alone be may be the most sensible course of action here. It is impossible to truly kill a Daemon of Nurgle, you would only invoke its ire.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Daemon tells the truth! Your warriors are all replenished by the healing properties of the tears. But of course, you always knew this boon would come at a terrible cost...

incidents.localised_description: The Daemon tells the truth! Your warriors are all replenished by the healing properties of the tears. But of course, you always knew this boon would come at a terrible cost...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Obviously, Daemons of Chaos are not be trusted! Slaying the creature wipes the nauseating taint of its putrefaction from the ruins.

incidents.localised_description: Obviously, Daemons of Chaos are not be trusted! Slaying the creature wipes the nauseating taint of its putrefaction from the ruins.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Cutting the foul, sickening flesh causes great gouts of pus and slime to gush forth, tainting the earth with its repellent corruption. Stand well back!

incidents.localised_description: Cutting the foul, sickening flesh causes great gouts of pus and slime to gush forth, tainting the earth with its repellent corruption. Stand well back!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Daemon was trying to distract you - a sleight of repulsive, pustulating hand, no less! Hidden beneath its foetid flesh you find chests stuffed with treasure.

incidents.localised_description: The Daemon was trying to distract you - a sleight of repulsive, pustulating hand, no less! Hidden beneath its foetid flesh you find chests stuffed with treasure.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whilst lifting the flaps of pallid flesh one of your retainers accidentally cuts the Daemon, causing great gouts of pus and slime to gush forth, tainting the ground with foul corruption.

incidents.localised_description: Whilst lifting the flaps of pallid flesh one of your retainers accidentally cuts the Daemon, causing great gouts of pus and slime to gush forth, tainting the ground with foul corruption.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Upon the altar are pages that appear to be from one of the Great Necromancer's Nine Books! The place is clearly cursed! Get out while you still can!

incidents.localised_description: Upon the altar are pages that appear to be from one of the Great Necromancer's Nine Books! The place is clearly cursed! Get out while you still can!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The shrine goes up in flames, taking the rest of the building with it. Better safe than sorry - you torch the surrounding area also before moving on.

incidents.localised_description: The shrine goes up in flames, taking the rest of the building with it. Better safe than sorry - you torch the surrounding area also before moving on.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The shrine goes up in flames, taking the rest of the building with it. You torch the surrounding area also before moving on – better safe than sorry!

incidents.localised_description: The shrine goes up in flames, taking the rest of the building with it. You torch the surrounding area also before moving on – better safe than sorry!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The shrine goes up in flames, but as the dust settles a ghostly figure rises from the ashes. This is not the result you had in mind...

incidents.localised_description: The shrine goes up in flames, but as the dust settles a ghostly figure rises from the ashes. This is not the result you had in mind...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Following a complicated ritual you are able to cleanse the shrine and remove the taint of the Undead from the room. You no longer have the feeling that you are under observation.

incidents.localised_description: Following a complicated ritual you are able to cleanse the shrine and remove the taint of the Undead from the room. You no longer have the feeling that you are under observation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Following a complicated ritual you are able to cleanse the shrine and remove the taint of the Undead from the room. You no longer have the feeling that you are under observation.

incidents.localised_description: Following a complicated ritual you are able to cleanse the shrine and remove the taint of the Undead from the room. You no longer have the feeling that you are under observation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The shrine is powerful and the cleansing ritual is time-consuming and costly. However, once it is complete you are able to remove all the artefacts found within.

incidents.localised_description: The shrine is powerful and the cleansing ritual is time-consuming and costly. However, once it is complete you are able to remove all the artefacts found within.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Embedded in the centre of the shrine you find a powerful magical item. You are surprised when you are able to easily lift it free.

incidents.localised_description: Embedded in the centre of the shrine you find a powerful magical item. You are surprised when you are able to easily lift it free.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is nothing of value within the shrine. During the course of the search you begin to feel different; the room starts to swim and your temperature soars! Clearly, you are now in the grip of a dark and terrible curse!

incidents.localised_description: There is nothing of value within the shrine. During the course of the search you begin to feel different; the room starts to swim and your temperature soars! Clearly, you are now in the grip of a dark and terrible curse!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Sometimes there's no way out but to reach for your purse. You begrudgingly pay the creatures and leave with your life intact, if not your dignity.

incidents.localised_description: Sometimes there's no way out but to reach for your purse. You begrudgingly pay the creatures and leave with your life intact, if not your dignity.

localised_description.last_approved_text: By their very nature, Skaven love to talk, so you manage to keep them busy until your scouts return. As they ride into the clearing the Skaven are surprised and panic, turn their tails and run away!

incidents.localised_description: By their very nature, Skaven love to talk, so you manage to keep them busy until your scouts return. As they ride into the clearing the Skaven are surprised and panic, turn their tails and run away!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Skaven are not the best conversationalists and you soon run out of things to say. You stall for as long as you can, but the scouting party never returns. Your only option is to pay the Skaven if you wish to live.

incidents.localised_description: Skaven are not the best conversationalists and you soon run out of things to say. You stall for as long as you can, but the scouting party never returns. Your only option is to pay the Skaven if you wish to live.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ratmen are neither rats nor men; you easily slay the Skaven. Their bodies are still littering your camp when the scouting party returns.

incidents.localised_description: Ratmen are neither rats nor men; you easily slay the Skaven. Their bodies are still littering your camp when the scouting party returns.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You fight bravely but are soon overpowered by the Skaven's overwhelming numbers. They take care to ensure you are unable to follow them before disappearing.

incidents.localised_description: You fight bravely but are soon overpowered by the Skaven's overwhelming numbers. They take care to ensure you are unable to follow them before disappearing.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Confused, impressed or afraid... you're not sure which; Skaven features are so hard to read. Either way, your ruse works: the Skaven eventually offer you tribute before quickly departing.

incidents.localised_description: Confused, impressed or afraid... you're not sure which; Skaven features are so hard to read. Either way, your ruse works: the Skaven eventually offer you tribute before quickly departing.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The more you talk, the less the Skaven seem to buy your story. Eventually they tire of listening and attack you. In the ensuing struggle, you escape with your life, but barely.

incidents.localised_description: The more you talk, the less the Skaven seem to buy your story. Eventually they tire of listening and attack you. In the ensuing struggle, you escape with your life, but barely.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Would the Skaven really leave evidence of their researches just lying around? You think not; obviously, this is an ambush, so you leave without further ado.

incidents.localised_description: Would the Skaven really leave evidence of their researches just lying around? You think not; obviously, this is an ambush, so you leave without further ado.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your experts are impressed by the Skaven's grasp of technology. This is ground-breaking stuff, revealing new manufacturing methods that could be used to your advantage.

incidents.localised_description: Your experts are impressed by the Skaven's grasp of technology. This is ground-breaking stuff, revealing new manufacturing methods that could be used to your advantage.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You order your experts glean whatever they can from it. However, their time is wasted - nothing worthwhile is discovered and your citizens are disgusted that you brought such evil into their midst.

incidents.localised_description: You order your experts glean whatever they can from it. However, their time is wasted - nothing worthwhile is discovered and your citizens are disgusted that you brought such evil into their midst.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Time spent searching the area reveals no ratmen lying in wait to surprise you. You collect the discarded machinery and find a rival Skaven clan eager to make a deal.

incidents.localised_description: Time spent searching the area reveals no ratmen lying in wait to surprise you. You collect the discarded machinery and find a rival Skaven clan eager to make a deal.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As no ambush presents itself, you take the machinery to rival Skaven who are known to pay for any advantage over their nemeses. However, they refuse, as it was abandoned for good reason...

incidents.localised_description: As no ambush presents itself, you take the machinery to rival Skaven who are known to pay for any advantage over their nemeses. However, they refuse, as it was abandoned for good reason...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whatever these Skaven intended, their feeble science is of little interest. The reclaimed materials are put to good use by your own artisans. There are no obvious ill effects... for now.

incidents.localised_description: Whatever these Skaven intended, their feeble science is of little interest. The reclaimed materials are put to good use by your own artisans. There are no obvious ill effects... for now.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have the machines melted down for your own purposes. However, the metals are laced with disease that quickly kills your artisans and spreads through your population.

incidents.localised_description: You have the machines melted down for your own purposes. However, the metals are laced with disease that quickly kills your artisans and spreads through your population.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The fungi are tempting, but could easily be poisonous - regardless of any corruption that the Dark Prince may have instilled within.

incidents.localised_description: The fungi are tempting, but could easily be poisonous - regardless of any corruption that the Dark Prince may have instilled within.

localised_description.last_approved_text: After inhaling the fungus your retainers are full of vitality but a strange glint in their eyes reveals the cost of this new found strength. Time to enlist some new followers, methinks!

incidents.localised_description: After inhaling the fungus your retainers are full of vitality but a strange glint in their eyes reveals the cost of this new found strength. Time to enlist some new followers, methinks!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It's probably best not to take any chances. You flatten the patch, removing the temptation of Chaos from the path of any and all who pass by.

incidents.localised_description: It's probably best not to take any chances. You flatten the patch, removing the temptation of Chaos from the path of any and all who pass by.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As your retainers stamp the patch flat the air becomes thick with spores. It isn't long before the taint of Chaos becomes apparent in their eyes and on their skin!

incidents.localised_description: As your retainers stamp the patch flat the air becomes thick with spores. It isn't long before the taint of Chaos becomes apparent in their eyes and on their skin!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There's more to be found here than a few poxy mushrooms! You command your retainers to ignore it and continue searching the area. At last, they find a stash of gold hidden in the bole of a rotten tree.

incidents.localised_description: There's more to be found here than a few poxy mushrooms! You command your retainers to ignore it and continue searching the area. At last, they find a stash of gold hidden in the bole of a rotten tree.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You command your retainers to ignore the fungi and search the area. They find nothing. Perhaps they're useless or maybe this is the beginning of Chaos' fell taint?

incidents.localised_description: You command your retainers to ignore the fungi and search the area. They find nothing. Perhaps they're useless or maybe this is the beginning of Chaos' fell taint?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Backing away slowly you make it out of the caverns without alerting the spiders to your presence - a lucky escape!

incidents.localised_description: Backing away slowly you make it out of the caverns without alerting the spiders to your presence - a lucky escape!

localised_description.last_approved_text: After a hard-fought battle you slay all of the spiders and retrieve the item from their web. Whatever it is, it better be worth it!

incidents.localised_description: After a hard-fought battle you slay all of the spiders and retrieve the item from their web. Whatever it is, it better be worth it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You fight bravely but the spiders soon overwhelm you. After taking a wound in the arm you flee the caverns, barely making it to safety.

incidents.localised_description: You fight bravely but the spiders soon overwhelm you. After taking a wound in the arm you flee the caverns, barely making it to safety.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You cut through the cobwebs, avoiding the spiders and quickly retrieve the item you spotted glinting behind them.

incidents.localised_description: You cut through the cobwebs, avoiding the spiders and quickly retrieve the item you spotted glinting behind them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The second your blade touches the web, hundreds of smaller spiders swarm from the darkness, engulfing you and your party. All is lost!

incidents.localised_description: The second your blade touches the web, hundreds of smaller spiders swarm from the darkness, engulfing you and your party. All is lost!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You ignore the spiders and take a different path into the caverns. Deep beneath the earth you find a long forgotten horde of treasure.

incidents.localised_description: You ignore the spiders and take a different path into the caverns. Deep beneath the earth you find a long forgotten horde of treasure.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You ignore the spiders and take a different path into the caverns. Unfortunately, the search soon proves fruitless.

incidents.localised_description: You ignore the spiders and take a different path into the caverns. Unfortunately, the search soon proves fruitless.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This place has known the touch of the gods - and maybe not the patrons of your own race! it would be wise to leave, at once!

incidents.localised_description: This place has known the touch of the gods - and maybe not the patrons of your own race! it would be wise to leave, at once!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You retrieve the sword and make a hasty escape - who knows what tricks and traps may have been left for even the wariest treasure hunter?

incidents.localised_description: You retrieve the sword and make a hasty escape - who knows what tricks and traps may have been left for even the wariest treasure hunter?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The second you touch the blade a cloud of purple smoke engulfs you. You stumble and bump into the walls - clearly, your mind is no longer your own...

incidents.localised_description: The second you touch the blade a cloud of purple smoke engulfs you. You stumble and bump into the walls - clearly, your mind is no longer your own...

localised_description.last_approved_text: A golden tribute to the gods sees the purple glow dissipate; gradually, the ancient sword dulls. On closer inspection it is a fine weapon worthy of a fine warrior!

incidents.localised_description: A golden tribute to the gods sees the purple glow dissipate; gradually, the ancient sword dulls. On closer inspection it is a fine weapon worthy of a fine warrior!

localised_description.last_approved_text: These passages were not dug for nought; a thorough search unearths treasures beyond counting! Your retainers gather it swiftly, yet carefully, in case of traps.

incidents.localised_description: These passages were not dug for nought; a thorough search unearths treasures beyond counting! Your retainers gather it swiftly, yet carefully, in case of traps.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rumbling begins, gradually getting louder. Otherworldly, maniacal laughter emanates from... somewhere close. This place is cursed! Only fools would venture further!

incidents.localised_description: A rumbling begins, gradually getting louder. Otherworldly, maniacal laughter emanates from... somewhere close. This place is cursed! Only fools would venture further!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Books are worthless, especially when your business is the accumulation of wealth or the annihilation of your opposition. Leave them behind.

incidents.localised_description: Books are worthless, especially when your business is the accumulation of wealth or the annihilation of your opposition. Leave them behind.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The translator gives back the book, his hands shaking. He informs you that it is a tome of great import, the contents of which will change the way we view the world forever.

incidents.localised_description: The translator gives back the book, his hands shaking. He informs you that it is a tome of great import, the contents of which will change the way we view the world forever.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The translator hands back the book, glancing at the weapons slung at your belt before speaking. Cautiously, he informs you that the tome is entirely without value!

incidents.localised_description: The translator hands back the book, glancing at the weapons slung at your belt before speaking. Cautiously, he informs you that the tome is entirely without value!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The translator informs you that the book is an ancient treatise on warfare, full of forgotten tactics. With the appropriate level of study, it could tip the scales in your favour.

incidents.localised_description: The translator informs you that the book is an ancient treatise on warfare, full of forgotten tactics. With the appropriate level of study, it could tip the scales in your favour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The translator says that it is in fact an ancient cookbook written by a certain 'Horston Burgerstal'. It contains a number of bizarre culinary concoctions, many of which look like they might be poisonous!

incidents.localised_description: The translator says that it is in fact an ancient cookbook written by a certain 'Horston Burgerstal'. It contains a number of bizarre culinary concoctions, many of which look like they might be poisonous!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Following a hasty and not-very-thorough inspection, the local book dealer says he is more than happy to take the volumes off your hands. Perhaps he is a little too happy...

incidents.localised_description: Following a hasty and not-very-thorough inspection, the local book dealer says he is more than happy to take the volumes off your hands. Perhaps he is a little too happy...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The local book dealer stops short of actually laughing in your face and wastes little time informing you that the books have no value... other than to a budding poisoner!

incidents.localised_description: The local book dealer stops short of actually laughing in your face and wastes little time informing you that the books have no value... other than to a budding poisoner!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is well known that the Underworld Sea is home to vicious monsters who will easily kill and eat your party if disturbed. Better to live to see another day...

incidents.localised_description: It is well known that the Underworld Sea is home to vicious monsters who will easily kill and eat your party if disturbed. Better to live to see another day...

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Kraken rises from the depths and attacks your party! After a hard-fought battle you are able to subdue the beast, but start to wonder if this treasure hunting malarkey is really worth the effort!
