incidents.localised_description: A Kraken rises from the depths and attacks your party! After a hard-fought battle you are able to subdue the beast, but start to wonder if this treasure hunting malarkey is really worth the effort!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Kraken rises from the waters and attacks your party! After a lengthy fight you are badly wounded and limp back to the surface. You conclude that there must be easier ways to swell your coffers!

incidents.localised_description: A Kraken rises from the waters and attacks your party! After a lengthy fight you are badly wounded and limp back to the surface. You conclude that there must be easier ways to swell your coffers!

localised_description.last_approved_text: On a pedestal in the centre of a still lake sits an item of great magical power. Discovering that the lake is shallow, you wade out and collect the object.

incidents.localised_description: On a pedestal in the centre of a still lake sits an item of great magical power. Discovering that the lake is shallow, you wade out and collect the object.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As you delve deeper into the caverns you become helplessly lost, and members of your party begin to panic. Clearly, it will be some time before you see the sun again...

incidents.localised_description: As you delve deeper into the caverns you become helplessly lost, and members of your party begin to panic. Clearly, it will be some time before you see the sun again...

localised_description.last_approved_text: A small row boat allows you to search the shallows. As it does so, a gleam of gold catches your eye. You haul the chest to the surface and treasure spills into the boat.

incidents.localised_description: A small row boat allows you to search the shallows. As it does so, a gleam of gold catches your eye. You haul the chest to the surface and treasure spills into the boat.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A small row boat allows you to search the shallows. On hearing the distant roar of a Kraken, your retainers all decide to turn tail and head for the entrance. Spineless cretins, all!

incidents.localised_description: A small row boat allows you to search the shallows. On hearing the distant roar of a Kraken, your retainers all decide to turn tail and head for the entrance. Spineless cretins, all!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Sacred ground should never be disturbed. You are wise to leave the dead to their breathless, eternal sleep and move on.

incidents.localised_description: Sacred ground should never be disturbed. You are wise to leave the dead to their breathless, eternal sleep and move on.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It takes several retainers to shift the lid of the sarcophagus. As it slides away, you are immediately rewarded for your pains; the gleam of gold from within is almost blinding.

incidents.localised_description: It takes several retainers to shift the lid of the sarcophagus. As it slides away, you are immediately rewarded for your pains; the gleam of gold from within is almost blinding.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It isn't easy to open the sarcophagus but when the lid finally moves a terrible stench of decay rises; you've just met the tomb's owner, in all his funereal glory!

incidents.localised_description: It isn't easy to open the sarcophagus but when the lid finally moves a terrible stench of decay rises; you've just met the tomb's owner, in all his funereal glory!

localised_description.last_approved_text: As you wipe the dirt from the artefact it glows with an eerie light; you feel a low pulse coursing through it and into your body.

incidents.localised_description: As you wipe the dirt from the artefact it glows with an eerie light; you feel a low pulse coursing through it and into your body.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You look around for a clue. Just as you are about to give up, an inscription on the wall reveals the location of a treasure vault, deep beneath the tomb.

incidents.localised_description: You look around for a clue. Just as you are about to give up, an inscription on the wall reveals the location of a treasure vault, deep beneath the tomb.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You look around for a clue, feeling that the riches are surely close by. After an hour of fruitless searching, however, it becomes clear there is nothing here to be found.

incidents.localised_description: You look around for a clue, feeling that the riches are surely close by. After an hour of fruitless searching, however, it becomes clear there is nothing here to be found.

localised_description.last_approved_text: So what if their homes have been destroyed? At least they still have their lives! You decide their plight isn't your problem and walk away.

incidents.localised_description: So what if their homes have been destroyed? At least they still have their lives! You decide their plight isn't your problem and walk away.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You free the survivors from the rubble. Grateful for your kindness, they swear a vow to serve you until their dying days. You suppose there may one day be a need for them.

incidents.localised_description: You free the survivors from the rubble. Grateful for your kindness, they swear a vow to serve you until their dying days. You suppose there may one day be a need for them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You free the survivors from the rubble. Grateful for your kindness, they swear a vow to serve you until their dying days. You suppose there may one day be a need for them.

incidents.localised_description: You free the survivors from the rubble. Grateful for your kindness, they swear a vow to serve you until their dying days. You suppose there may one day be a need for them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your retainers get to work, moving much of the rubble, but by the time you get to the bodies it is already too late.

incidents.localised_description: Your retainers get to work, moving much of the rubble, but by the time you get to the bodies it is already too late.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The survivors say they will lead you to a cache of supplies in return for saving their lives. After you free them, they make good on their promise.

incidents.localised_description: The survivors say they will lead you to a cache of supplies in return for saving their lives. After you free them, they make good on their promise.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Amazed by your callousness, the survivors let out a string of curses as you walk away. They will all die, but it is too late to reverse the effects of their magical mischief.

incidents.localised_description: Amazed by your callousness, the survivors let out a string of curses as you walk away. They will all die, but it is too late to reverse the effects of their magical mischief.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ignoring the cries for help you continue your search and find a small cache of gemstones in a collapsed building nearby. Truly, a serendipitous event!

incidents.localised_description: Ignoring the cries for help you continue your search and find a small cache of gemstones in a collapsed building nearby. Truly, a serendipitous event!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ignoring the cries for help you continue your search, but there is nothing of value. Time to leave...

incidents.localised_description: Ignoring the cries for help you continue your search, but there is nothing of value. Time to leave...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Trapped, you resign yourself to a long wait - it is some time before a retainer triggers the same mechanism and releases you.

incidents.localised_description: Trapped, you resign yourself to a long wait - it is some time before a retainer triggers the same mechanism and releases you.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The mechanism is actually pretty simple and you easily manage to open the doors. As they slide open a secret panel is revealed, containing Dwarfen riches.

incidents.localised_description: The mechanism is actually pretty simple and you easily manage to open the doors. As they slide open a secret panel is revealed, containing Dwarfen riches.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Tinkering with the mechanism causes the doors to fly open, but the vault collapses around you. You get out before you're buried alive, but it was a very narrow escape.

incidents.localised_description: Tinkering with the mechanism causes the doors to fly open, but the vault collapses around you. You get out before you're buried alive, but it was a very narrow escape.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Some rudimentary investigation reveals a small trapdoor, hidden beneath some barrels, in the corner of the room. The passageway beneath leads back to the vault; you emerge from another direction, to the surprise of your retainers.

incidents.localised_description: Some rudimentary investigation reveals a small trapdoor, hidden beneath some barrels, in the corner of the room. The passageway beneath leads back to the vault; you emerge from another direction, to the surprise of your retainers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In the attempt to escape you accidentally set off a second trap. A powder keg explodes, blowing the doors open and injuring you in the process and illustrating why you should always take a retainer with you...

incidents.localised_description: In the attempt to escape you accidentally set off a second trap. A powder keg explodes, blowing the doors open and injuring you in the process and illustrating why you should always take a retainer with you...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The runes explain how to open the door using the complicated mechanism. They also reveal how to construct said mechanism and others like it; Dwarfish secrets? Not for long!

incidents.localised_description: The runes explain how to open the door using the complicated mechanism. They also reveal how to construct said mechanism and others like it; Dwarfish secrets? Not for long!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You quickly remember that you have no idea how to read the runes before you, so escape by your own means seems unlikely. Your only option is to sit and wait for rescue.

incidents.localised_description: You quickly remember that you have no idea how to read the runes before you, so escape by your own means seems unlikely. Your only option is to sit and wait for rescue.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You stand to gain nothing from engaging the Undead, except perhaps joining them somewhat swifter than planned!

incidents.localised_description: You stand to gain nothing from engaging the Undead, except perhaps joining them somewhat swifter than planned!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Upon closer inspection you discover they are merely corpses propped up on sticks, intended to protect something. Investigation of the ruins reveals a small hoard of ritual currency hidden within.

incidents.localised_description: Upon closer inspection you discover they are merely corpses propped up on sticks, intended to protect something. Investigation of the ruins reveals a small hoard of ritual currency hidden within.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Closer inspection reveals the bodies are merely corpses propped up on sticks. You pull them down and give them a decent burial.

incidents.localised_description: Closer inspection reveals the bodies are merely corpses propped up on sticks. You pull them down and give them a decent burial.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You order your troops to attack from range. With impressive precision the Undead are taken down in one volley. This remarkable feat cheers the troops and improves their leadership.

incidents.localised_description: You order your troops to attack from range. With impressive precision the Undead are taken down in one volley. This remarkable feat cheers the troops and improves their leadership.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Repeated volleys fail to fell the Unliving enemy. Your troops waste far too much ammunition on a seemingly simple task.

incidents.localised_description: Repeated volleys fail to fell the Unliving enemy. Your troops waste far too much ammunition on a seemingly simple task.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It seems that whatever the Undead are guarding has already been looted - the land around the building has been picked clean.

incidents.localised_description: It seems that whatever the Undead are guarding has already been looted - the land around the building has been picked clean.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whilst you search elsewhere, rumours of the Undead presence spreads. Your people are outraged that you would place plunder above their safety.

incidents.localised_description: Whilst you search elsewhere, rumours of the Undead presence spreads. Your people are outraged that you would place plunder above their safety.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your exploits on the high seas have heralded benign weather, allowing for greater movement in these regions.

incidents.localised_description: Your exploits on the high seas have heralded benign weather, allowing for greater movement in these regions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your exploits on the high seas have heralded benign weather, allowing for greater movement in these regions.

incidents.localised_description: Your exploits on the high seas have heralded benign weather, allowing for greater movement in these regions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your exploration of the high seas has borne fruit: a bounty of maps to uncharted realms, revealing more of the world.

incidents.localised_description: Your exploration of the high seas has borne fruit: a bounty of maps to uncharted realms, revealing more of the world.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your exploration of the high seas has borne fruit: a bounty of maps to uncharted realms, revealing more of the world.

incidents.localised_description: Your exploration of the high seas has borne fruit: a bounty of maps to uncharted realms, revealing more of the world.

localised_description.last_approved_text: During your adventures on the high seas you procured a bounty of rations to stave off attrition and ill-health.

incidents.localised_description: During your adventures on the high seas you procured a bounty of rations to stave off attrition and ill-health.

localised_description.last_approved_text: During your adventures on the high seas you procured a bounty of rations to stave off attrition and ill-health.

incidents.localised_description: During your adventures on the high seas you procured a bounty of rations to stave off attrition and ill-health.

localised_description.last_approved_text: During your dalliances on the high seas you came across stranded crew, willing to join you in exchange for food and rescue.

incidents.localised_description: During your dalliances on the high seas you came across stranded crew, willing to join you in exchange for food and rescue.

localised_description.last_approved_text: During your dalliances on the high seas you came across stranded crew, willing to join you in exchange for food and rescue.

incidents.localised_description: During your dalliances on the high seas you came across stranded crew, willing to join you in exchange for food and rescue.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your exploits on the high seas has led to the salvage of arcane imbued blades, enhancing your army’s combat skills.

incidents.localised_description: Your exploits on the high seas has led to the salvage of arcane imbued blades, enhancing your army’s combat skills.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your exploits on the high seas has led to the salvage of arcane imbued blades, enhancing your army’s combat skills.

incidents.localised_description: Your exploits on the high seas has led to the salvage of arcane imbued blades, enhancing your army’s combat skills.

localised_description.last_approved_text: During your adventure on the high seas you salvaged heavy armour and an arsenal of weapons.

incidents.localised_description: During your adventure on the high seas you salvaged heavy armour and an arsenal of weapons.

localised_description.last_approved_text: During your adventure on the high seas you salvaged heavy armour and an arsenal of weapons.

incidents.localised_description: During your adventure on the high seas you salvaged heavy armour and an arsenal of weapons.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your escapades on the high seas have lumbered your army with a curse… losing their sanity in a blood-induced frenzy!

incidents.localised_description: Your escapades on the high seas have lumbered your army with a curse… losing their sanity in a blood-induced frenzy!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your escapades on the high seas have lumbered your army with a curse… losing their sanity in a blood-induced frenzy!

incidents.localised_description: Your escapades on the high seas have lumbered your army with a curse… losing their sanity in a blood-induced frenzy!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your exploration of the high seas has led to blessings from the Lord of the Deeps – your troops will be protected from harm while they have the Elven God’s favour.

incidents.localised_description: Your exploration of the high seas has led to blessings from the Lord of the Deeps – your troops will be protected from harm while they have the Elven God’s favour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your exploration of the high seas has led to blessings from the Lord of the Deeps – your troops will be protected from harm while they have the Elven god’s favour.

incidents.localised_description: Your exploration of the high seas has led to blessings from the Lord of the Deeps – your troops will be protected from harm while they have the Elven god’s favour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your encounter on the high seas is not one the crew or troops will readily talk about, yet they have gained regenerative abilities since the event…

incidents.localised_description: Your encounter on the high seas is not one the crew or troops will readily talk about, yet they have gained regenerative abilities since the event…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your encounter on the high seas is not one the crew or troops will readily talk about, yet they have gained regenerative abilities since the event…

incidents.localised_description: Your encounter on the high seas is not one the crew or troops will readily talk about, yet they have gained regenerative abilities since the event…

localised_description.last_approved_text: A new training regimen for your Heroes teaches them to veil their intent beneath a sheen of civility. After all, a killer with the manners of a rabbit is the most dangerous kind. The chances of successful Hero actions have now improved.

incidents.localised_description: A new training regimen for your Heroes teaches them to veil their intent beneath a sheen of civility. After all, a killer with the manners of a rabbit is the most dangerous kind. The chances of successful Hero actions have now improved.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The example you set is inspirational. The Heroes under your command are proud to carry out your will, and do so eagerly. The cost for all Hero actions has fallen.

incidents.localised_description: The example you set is inspirational. The Heroes under your command are proud to carry out your will, and do so eagerly. The cost for all Hero actions has fallen.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In a drive to improve combat stamina across your armed forces, the High Quartermaster has been experimenting with new ration combinations. His latest concoction is a bowel-addling patty of horse flesh, pickled fish and Forest Spider spinnerets, served between toasted discs of sweetened bread. They haven't a clue what they're eating but the troops can't get enough. Army replenishment is up, but due to frequent toilet stops, movement range is down.

incidents.localised_description: In a drive to improve combat stamina across your armed forces, the High Quartermaster has been experimenting with new ration combinations. His latest concoction is a bowel-addling patty of horse flesh, pickled fish and Forest Spider spinnerets, served between toasted discs of sweetened bread. They haven't a clue what they're eating but the troops can't get enough. Army replenishment is up, but due to frequent toilet stops, movement range is down.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A conclave of your generals has struck upon the notion of pressing popular musicians into military service. This has come as a shock to the performers in question, but has proved an instant hit with the troops and they’re marching harder than ever before. Army movement range has increased!

incidents.localised_description: A conclave of your generals has struck upon the notion of pressing popular musicians into military service. This has come as a shock to the performers in question, but has proved an instant hit with the troops and they’re marching harder than ever before. Army movement range has increased!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Through a network of informants, this Hero has uncovered an assassination plot against you by a high-ranking traitor. Rather than spook the fiend, the Hero let the conspiracy play out, identifying all collaborators in the process, and leapt before the blade as it was thrust. This character is now wounded, but has gained great experience from their actions.

incidents.localised_description: Through a network of informants, this Hero has uncovered an assassination plot against you by a high-ranking traitor. Rather than spook the fiend, the Hero let the conspiracy play out, identifying all collaborators in the process, and leapt before the blade as it was thrust. This character is now wounded, but has gained great experience from their actions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your Heroes spend every spare moment they have honing their skills, and it shows. This character now has increased their experience.

incidents.localised_description: Your Heroes spend every spare moment they have honing their skills, and it shows. This character now has increased their experience.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your traders have excelled themselves! An over-abundance of quality building materials has appeared on the market, reducing construction costs.

incidents.localised_description: Your traders have excelled themselves! An over-abundance of quality building materials has appeared on the market, reducing construction costs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The ferocious foreman of your logging operation has been applying the whip with unseemly zeal. Workers are vacating the camps en masse and timber production is dwindling, driving up the construction costs.

incidents.localised_description: The ferocious foreman of your logging operation has been applying the whip with unseemly zeal. Workers are vacating the camps en masse and timber production is dwindling, driving up the construction costs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your buildings have taken critical damage and cannot perform their function. Deploy the repair crews!

incidents.localised_description: Your buildings have taken critical damage and cannot perform their function. Deploy the repair crews!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The cheap, brittle mortar in your production centres is showing its age. Repair crews have been dispatched but the remedial work is disruptive, and income from your buildings has suffered as a result.

incidents.localised_description: The cheap, brittle mortar in your production centres is showing its age. Repair crews have been dispatched but the remedial work is disruptive, and income from your buildings has suffered as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A thaumaturgist in one of your provinces has been tasked with squeezing greater profit from industrial processes. Lost in thought one day while inspecting a smelting plant, he slipped and plunged into the roiling slag. His death was not in vain however, as the smelters discovered that the introduction of osseous matter worked to strengthen the metal, raising its value; profits are up factionwide!

incidents.localised_description: A thaumaturgist in one of your provinces has been tasked with squeezing greater profit from industrial processes. Lost in thought one day while inspecting a smelting plant, he slipped and plunged into the roiling slag. His death was not in vain however, as the smelters discovered that the introduction of osseous matter worked to strengthen the metal, raising its value; profits are up factionwide!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The inhabitants of your empire tire of the constant threat of war on their doorstep. Due to the uncertainty conflict brings, growth has taken a sudden nosedive.

incidents.localised_description: The inhabitants of your empire tire of the constant threat of war on their doorstep. Due to the uncertainty conflict brings, growth has taken a sudden nosedive.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A shrewd programme of stockpiling across your provinces has literally borne fruit, and food-stores are bountifully abundant. The population is in rude health, and growth is on the rise.

incidents.localised_description: A shrewd programme of stockpiling across your provinces has literally borne fruit, and food-stores are bountifully abundant. The population is in rude health, and growth is on the rise.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A charismatic soothsayer has impassioned the locals in this province with his doctrine of vigorous procreation. While the population is sharply rising, an exhausted workforce is a not a productive one.

incidents.localised_description: A charismatic soothsayer has impassioned the locals in this province with his doctrine of vigorous procreation. While the population is sharply rising, an exhausted workforce is a not a productive one.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This army has undertaken a rigorous new training regime focused on frontline combat, yielding excellent results. All units now have improved melee attack capabilities.

incidents.localised_description: This army has undertaken a rigorous new training regime focused on frontline combat, yielding excellent results. All units now have improved melee attack capabilities.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have instituted defensive training for this army's troops, teaching them to better anticipate incoming blows. All units now have improved melee defence capabilities.

incidents.localised_description: You have instituted defensive training for this army's troops, teaching them to better anticipate incoming blows. All units now have improved melee defence capabilities.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the Great Vortex vacillates on its axis, the Winds of Magic fluctuate distressingly, eliciting wild-eyed portents of doom from hedge-wizards throughout your empire. The troops are cowed by these omens and leadership has decreased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: As the Great Vortex vacillates on its axis, the Winds of Magic fluctuate distressingly, eliciting wild-eyed portents of doom from hedge-wizards throughout your empire. The troops are cowed by these omens and leadership has decreased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your forces are benefitting from a protracted period of good weather; rations are plentiful and there's a spring in the troops' stride. As a result, army leadership has increased factionwide!

incidents.localised_description: Your forces are benefitting from a protracted period of good weather; rations are plentiful and there's a spring in the troops' stride. As a result, army leadership has increased factionwide!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A network of seditious ne'er-do-wells sows discord in your provinces and public order is falling. Seek methods to remedy this before it erupts into a full-blown rebellion!

incidents.localised_description: A network of seditious ne'er-do-wells sows discord in your provinces and public order is falling. Seek methods to remedy this before it erupts into a full-blown rebellion!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Conflict in a nearby region has driven the inhabitants into your territory. This has greatly increased local tensions, but represents a rich source of cheap manpower for their armies.

incidents.localised_description: Conflict in a nearby region has driven the inhabitants into your territory. This has greatly increased local tensions, but represents a rich source of cheap manpower for their armies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A ribald rhymer of raucous repute has arrived in your lands. As you tour the settlements his vulgar verse spreads like the Galloping Scumpox, sowing boundless cheer in the locals; public order has now risen in response.

incidents.localised_description: A ribald rhymer of raucous repute has arrived in your lands. As you tour the settlements his vulgar verse spreads like the Galloping Scumpox, sowing boundless cheer in the locals; public order has now risen in response.

localised_description.last_approved_text: New targeting techniques have been introduced to your armies' training regimens, teaching the troops to focus on the enemy's weak points. Damage from missile weapons has increased factionwide as a result.

incidents.localised_description: New targeting techniques have been introduced to your armies' training regimens, teaching the troops to focus on the enemy's weak points. Damage from missile weapons has increased factionwide as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A recent clutch of reports regarding ill-discipline in the lower ranks is cause for concern. Clearly, clods are being hired - this has to stop! Recruitment costs have risen accordingly, but new recruits begin two ranks higher.

incidents.localised_description: A recent clutch of reports regarding ill-discipline in the lower ranks is cause for concern. Clearly, clods are being hired - this has to stop! Recruitment costs have risen accordingly, but new recruits begin two ranks higher.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A caprice of nature or something more sinister? Either way, this unusually long spell of bitter weather is taking its toll on your armed forces. Replenishment is down, but the appeal of guaranteed rations means new recruits are clamouring to join up, driving down recruitment costs.

incidents.localised_description: A caprice of nature or something more sinister? Either way, this unusually long spell of bitter weather is taking its toll on your armed forces. Replenishment is down, but the appeal of guaranteed rations means new recruits are clamouring to join up, driving down recruitment costs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Seeking the gift of regeneration, an imprudent cabal of young magic-users has been dabbling in Ogre gastromancy. But disaster strikes, as they inadvertently summon the Great Maw itself! Smacking its lips with delight at the banquet laid out before it, the Maw devours the hapless sorcerers where they stand and disappears with a satisfied belch. This arcane upheaval has sapped the Winds of Magic factionwide!

incidents.localised_description: Seeking the gift of regeneration, an imprudent cabal of young magic-users has been dabbling in Ogre gastromancy. But disaster strikes, as they inadvertently summon the Great Maw itself! Smacking its lips with delight at the banquet laid out before it, the Maw devours the hapless sorcerers where they stand and disappears with a satisfied belch. This arcane upheaval has sapped the Winds of Magic factionwide!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A microscopic fissure has opened between the material world and the Realm of Chaos. It is a fleeting event, quite beneath the notice of even the gods, but potent enough to invigorate the Winds of Magic power reserve.

incidents.localised_description: A microscopic fissure has opened between the material world and the Realm of Chaos. It is a fleeting event, quite beneath the notice of even the gods, but potent enough to invigorate the Winds of Magic power reserve.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Great Warding teeters on its axis and weakens for a moment. Before it recovers, the Winds of Magic burst forth in a tumultuous gyre around your army, greatly boosting their power reserve but increasing the likelihood of miscasts.

incidents.localised_description: The Great Warding teeters on its axis and weakens for a moment. Before it recovers, the Winds of Magic burst forth in a tumultuous gyre around your army, greatly boosting their power reserve but increasing the likelihood of miscasts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rising assassin with an already impressive blood-tally to his name has sworn fealty to you and is now available for use. Send him forth in Khaine's bloody name!

incidents.localised_description: A rising assassin with an already impressive blood-tally to his name has sworn fealty to you and is now available for use. Send him forth in Khaine's bloody name!

localised_description.last_approved_text: When a slave steps on your foot, how should you respond? With incandescent rage perhaps, consuming them and several others in a coruscating conflagration? This young Dark One did just that, to your resounding approval, and is now available for use.

incidents.localised_description: When a slave steps on your foot, how should you respond? With incandescent rage perhaps, consuming them and several others in a coruscating conflagration? This young Dark One did just that, to your resounding approval, and is now available for use.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A bitter blood-feud between two lieutenants in this army - one feared and respected, the other universally loathed - has been swiftly dealt with. Perhaps too swiftly, for in his rage the wrong Elf was slain. As a result, the army's leadership has fallen and recruitment costs have risen too.

incidents.localised_description: A bitter blood-feud between two lieutenants in this army - one feared and respected, the other universally loathed - has been swiftly dealt with. Perhaps too swiftly, for in his rage the wrong Elf was slain. As a result, the army's leadership has fallen and recruitment costs have risen too.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A highborn Lord of Ulthuan has been captured along with his honour-guard. Naturally, they are being paraded around this province in chains before their inevitable - and exquisitely slow - public execution. The local inhabitants are ecstatic at this delicious turn of events, resulting in local improvements to public order and army leadership.

incidents.localised_description: A highborn Lord of Ulthuan has been captured along with his honour-guard. Naturally, they are being paraded around this province in chains before their inevitable - and exquisitely slow - public execution. The local inhabitants are ecstatic at this delicious turn of events, resulting in local improvements to public order and army leadership.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Uncommonly clement weather has driven the gargantuan denizens of the seas further north, resulting in an easy season of raiding and pillaging across the ocean for the reavers. Now, the streets of Karond Kar throng with fresh slaves, ripe and ready to be distributed around Naggaroth. Due to this influx of fresh labour, building costs have decreased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: Uncommonly clement weather has driven the gargantuan denizens of the seas further north, resulting in an easy season of raiding and pillaging across the ocean for the reavers. Now, the streets of Karond Kar throng with fresh slaves, ripe and ready to be distributed around Naggaroth. Due to this influx of fresh labour, building costs have decreased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Dreadlord of Hag Graef has formed a compact with a Lord of Chaos! Even as he enjoys the dark pleasures his deal has bought, the twisted influence of the Dark Gods insinuates itself across your holdings. As a result, Chaos corruption has risen factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: A Dreadlord of Hag Graef has formed a compact with a Lord of Chaos! Even as he enjoys the dark pleasures his deal has bought, the twisted influence of the Dark Gods insinuates itself across your holdings. As a result, Chaos corruption has risen factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Cold One breeder, reputed for his voracious pit-fighting animals, has exploited his trade-contacts to acquire certain rare fungi used by the Night Goblins. Thus dosed, his enraged creations are unstoppable against regular stock. In fact the compound is so effective than none will now bet against the beasts; there's just no sport in it! The pit-owners refuse to field them and sales have fallen off a cliff, so the breeder has offered you his surfeit of reeking 'shrooms. The answer, quite obviously, is "Yes!" Duly dosed, his Cold One units now have enhanced melee attack capabilities factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: A Cold One breeder, reputed for his voracious pit-fighting animals, has exploited his trade-contacts to acquire certain rare fungi used by the Night Goblins. Thus dosed, his enraged creations are unstoppable against regular stock. In fact the compound is so effective than none will now bet against the beasts; there's just no sport in it! The pit-owners refuse to field them and sales have fallen off a cliff, so the breeder has offered you his surfeit of reeking 'shrooms. The answer, quite obviously, is "Yes!" Duly dosed, his Cold One units now have enhanced melee attack capabilities factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A building in one of your settlements has suffered catastrophic damage! Irksomely, but fairly inconsequentially, it has also collapsed on a great congregation of slaves. Naturally, it must be repaired before it can function again, and the slave population in this province has declined.

incidents.localised_description: A building in one of your settlements has suffered catastrophic damage! Irksomely, but fairly inconsequentially, it has also collapsed on a great congregation of slaves. Naturally, it must be repaired before it can function again, and the slave population in this province has declined.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Crone Hellebron has ordered Death Night be extended by two further nights this year. The streets of Har Ganeth are awash with blood and viscera as its inhabitants release their pent-up, year-long furies in a breathtaking orgy of bloodletting. As a result, Witch Elf recruitment costs have fallen, and their starting experience level has increased.

incidents.localised_description: Crone Hellebron has ordered Death Night be extended by two further nights this year. The streets of Har Ganeth are awash with blood and viscera as its inhabitants release their pent-up, year-long furies in a breathtaking orgy of bloodletting. As a result, Witch Elf recruitment costs have fallen, and their starting experience level has increased.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The administrator of this province has been slain in the most grisly and ingenious fashion. While the artful method of his demise is loudly applauded by his peers, they soon descend into infighting and murderous quarrels in a bid to outdo the assassin and claim the office for themselves. The population, left unchecked, soon follows suit. Now, growth in this province is falling!

incidents.localised_description: The administrator of this province has been slain in the most grisly and ingenious fashion. While the artful method of his demise is loudly applauded by his peers, they soon descend into infighting and murderous quarrels in a bid to outdo the assassin and claim the office for themselves. The population, left unchecked, soon follows suit. Now, growth in this province is falling!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A sharp-tongued troubadour is touring your lands, reminding his audiences of how Bel Shanaar succeeded Aenarion to become the second Phoenix Lord, denying the Witch King his birthright. Your subjects' hatred is whetted anew, their fury toward the Asur reawakened in earnest. Factionwide, your warriors now have improved leadership and melee attack when fighting against the High Elves.

incidents.localised_description: A sharp-tongued troubadour is touring your lands, reminding his audiences of how Bel Shanaar succeeded Aenarion to become the second Phoenix Lord, denying the Witch King his birthright. Your subjects' hatred is whetted anew, their fury toward the Asur reawakened in earnest. Factionwide, your warriors now have improved leadership and melee attack when fighting against the High Elves.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the slave population has now dropped to barely-sustainable levels, local administrators have outlawed the inhabitants from slaying them at whim. The violent public outcry can be heard clear to the city limits. Public order has fallen as a result!

incidents.localised_description: As the slave population has now dropped to barely-sustainable levels, local administrators have outlawed the inhabitants from slaying them at whim. The violent public outcry can be heard clear to the city limits. Public order has fallen as a result!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A fashion for devising new and more exquisite forms of torture has developed among the lower ranks, and they are practicing it every chance that they get! A tongue under duress may reveal many secrets, after all. As one might expect, the income from raiding and sacking has increased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: A fashion for devising new and more exquisite forms of torture has developed among the lower ranks, and they are practicing it every chance that they get! A tongue under duress may reveal many secrets, after all. As one might expect, the income from raiding and sacking has increased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Faced with yet more bland rations, this army has turned to the dark practice of cannibalism... with the hearty blessing of its catering corps, of course. Now, once a battle has been won, limbs of the slain are being enthusiastically collected, salted and cured for the long road ahead, with the troops thriving on these most morbid of provisions. Replenishment rate and army movement range have increased as a result.

incidents.localised_description: Faced with yet more bland rations, this army has turned to the dark practice of cannibalism... with the hearty blessing of its catering corps, of course. Now, once a battle has been won, limbs of the slain are being enthusiastically collected, salted and cured for the long road ahead, with the troops thriving on these most morbid of provisions. Replenishment rate and army movement range have increased as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Following successful raids on key targets in enemy lands, a number of enemy intellectuals have been 'acquired'. With a little persuasion, their skills and experience have been harnessed - they have been put to work improving the level of technology available to you in order that he might score further victories over the hated foe and bring about rightful Druchii supremacy. Just as you intended, the rate of research has increased factionwide, and requiring very little effort from anyone other than the slaves, whose lot it is to suffer and die!

Just as you intended, the rate of research has increased factionwide, and requiring very little effort from anyone other than the slaves, whose lot it is to suffer and die!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A carcass of some great sea beast has been spotted off the larboard bow. Whatever the beast was is now unclear, for both Father Time and Father Nurgle have had their pleasure. Yet, the corpse still remains floating. You dispatch crew to see if any treasures can be found within its guts or exotic organs that can be harvested for trophies; things like this mark you and your force out as grand seafarers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The sea has given up the bloated corpse of a large monster that dwelled deep under the ocean. Crew are sent across to hazard upon the beast's rotting flesh, avoiding fleshy sumps and gas pockets. However, within its cavernous bowels, trinkets and treasures can be found. Even the decaying organs and bones of the creature will have some value and gain the fleet status for such an infamous find.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With a gush of putrid water, the bloated corpse of an ancient sea leviathan surfaces close by. Your crew are sent to investigate - to see what secrets the cadaver of the ancient sea beast will bestow. Such an expedition is not without risk, as these creatures, when alive, are known to host parasites the size of wolves and even colonies of needle-toothed aquatic man-things. On this occasion, the corpse is bereft of passengers but there are valuables to be found within its stinking gut.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This wreck was once part of a convoy, brought low by the angry Sea God, Stromfels. The precious goods in the holds was lost with the ships, much to the chagrin of their investors and factors back at their homeports, but their loss is your opportunity. Your crew make ready to take on salvage.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The seabed is littered with the broken hulls of ships from various races who have set out to tame the oceans. Many of these vessels were carrying riches from the new world back to their masters in the capitals. Some were transporting more than mere treasure... One such shipwreck has been discovered - the crew is sent to haul its riches back to the surface.

localised_description.last_approved_text: From the crow's nest come shouts that broken masts can be seen piercing the ocean's surface. As the fleet closes, the crew spot a sunken ship lying amidst the shoals. Such ships would rarely be this far from land without good reason and that reason would mostly likely involve treasure!

Such ships would rarely be this far from land without good reason and that reason would mostly likely involve treasure!

As the fleet closes, the crew spot a sunken ship lying amidst the shoals. Such ships would rarely be this far from land without good reason and that reason would mostly likely involve treasure!

Such ships would rarely be this far from land without good reason and that reason would mostly likely involve treasure!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The wooden carcass of a ship has been discovered strewn across a small, mysterious island. Beyond the beach, gold and other trinkets are found, surrounded by the long-dead crew who starved whilst waiting to be rescued. Some of your own crew whisper of curses, but they can die safe and poor if they wish.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An island rises out of the sea before you. As your fleet approaches the crew hear a song that carries over the turbulent surf; a tune that promises much, as the lyrics sing of everything from the untold riches of Greasus Goldtooth to some of Nagash's secrets of Undeath. The verses foretell the attainment of great power and wealth, all the crew need do is bring their vessel closer to shore... The crew do make it to the beach but the captain has ensured their ears are covered from the sea banshee's temptations. On the island, they discover the cargo and remnants of crews that were not so well protected.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The mists part to reveal an island uncharted by even the Great Mapwright. High spars of rock jut from ocean, like spikes in a trap - a trap that has ensnared some prey. A wrecked ship lies impaled on the small island's coastline; its crew seem to have moved into the interior along with any valuables that may have been onboard. Your ship wisely drops anchor far offshore before the crew make landfall in search of treasure.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The skull-shaped lair lying ominously on the horizon could only be the hidden hoard of Count Noctilus, the legendary Vampire Admiral, who was the scourge of the seas in his great vessel, 'The Bloody Reaver'. Legend has it that Noctilus' treasure is hidden upon the Great Ocean and guarded by zombie crewmates damned to protect it for all eternity. That is until your fleet chances upon the lair...

localised_description.last_approved_text: A highborn warrior of the Asur has arrived at court and pledged his service to you in whatever capacity you see fit. He respectfully awaits your orders.

incidents.localised_description: A highborn warrior of the Asur has arrived at court and pledged his service to you in whatever capacity you see fit. He respectfully awaits your orders.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A powerful Mage - one schooled in the ancient ways first developed by the mighty Caledor Dragontamer - has pledged his allegiance to you. Elves of such distinction, who have immersed themselves completely in the study of High Magic, should be retained and deployed in your service, to the detriment of his enemies!

incidents.localised_description: A powerful Mage - one schooled in the ancient ways first developed by the mighty Caledor Dragontamer - has pledged his allegiance to you. Elves of such distinction, who have immersed themselves completely in the study of High Magic, should be retained and deployed in your service, to the detriment of his enemies!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A sheaf of Elven architectural manuscripts dating from the reign of Caradryel have been discovered by your spies in the Old World. They detail techniques long forgotten, espousing principles so old as to be new again. As a result, building costs have decreased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: A sheaf of Elven architectural manuscripts dating from the reign of Caradryel have been discovered by your spies in the Old World. They detail techniques long forgotten, espousing principles so old as to be new again. As a result, building costs have decreased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The earth is more ancient than the Elven race, and seems to favour your primacy. Perhaps it divines the gravity of the mission, and in turn reduces its own, for their troops find marching is easier and less tiring than was previously the case. Campaign movement ranges have increased factionwide as a result.

incidents.localised_description: The earth is more ancient than the Elven race, and seems to favour your primacy. Perhaps it divines the gravity of the mission, and in turn reduces its own, for their troops find marching is easier and less tiring than was previously the case. Campaign movement ranges have increased factionwide as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: All eyes turn anxiously to the Isle of the Dead, as the Great Vortex seems to shimmer and slow on its axis. There are fell whispers on the breeze, and all seem troubled in ways they cannot define. As a result, insidious, creeping Chaos corruption has increased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: All eyes turn anxiously to the Isle of the Dead, as the Great Vortex seems to shimmer and slow on its axis. There are fell whispers on the breeze, and all seem troubled in ways they cannot define. As a result, insidious, creeping Chaos corruption has increased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A building's structure has become unsound, and those within have been evacuated. In order to restore its function, it must be repaired soon.

incidents.localised_description: A building's structure has become unsound, and those within have been evacuated. In order to restore its function, it must be repaired soon.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people of this province are deeply troubled. Rumours abound of some unnamed plot hatched in Naggaroth that will come to imminent fruition and, while you suspect that this is some insidious form of propaganda, it is beginning to affect their everyday lives. Growth has fallen as a result.

incidents.localised_description: The people of this province are deeply troubled. Rumours abound of some unnamed plot hatched in Naggaroth that will come to imminent fruition and, while you suspect that this is some insidious form of propaganda, it is beginning to affect their everyday lives. Growth has fallen as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of this army's lieutenants has attempted to curry favour with his captain using the largesse of his family's estate. The offer turned sour when the captain, looking more deeply into his subordinate's background, discovered his house to be a distant ally of Morathi. Publicly denouncing the Lieutenant - who has since left the service - should have worked, but the army's reputation has been harmed beyond immediate repair. Army leadership has fallen, and recruitment costs have risen as a result of this shame.

incidents.localised_description: One of this army's lieutenants has attempted to curry favour with his captain using the largesse of his family's estate. The offer turned sour when the captain, looking more deeply into his subordinate's background, discovered his house to be a distant ally of Morathi. Publicly denouncing the Lieutenant - who has since left the service - should have worked, but the army's reputation has been harmed beyond immediate repair. Army leadership has fallen, and recruitment costs have risen as a result of this shame.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An exquisitely penned history of the Phoenix Lord Bel Shanaar has become widely popular. This artful blending of poetry and prose has caught the imagination of the people and has awakened within them a fresh hatred for Malekith and the foul betrayals of the Druchii. As a result, leadership and melee attack capabilities when facing Dark Elves have risen factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: An exquisitely penned history of the Phoenix Lord Bel Shanaar has become widely popular. This artful blending of poetry and prose has caught the imagination of the people and has awakened within them a fresh hatred for Malekith and the foul betrayals of the Druchii. As a result, leadership and melee attack capabilities when facing Dark Elves have risen factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This province has declared a month of celebration in honour of the Everqueen. With poignant theatre, public dances, contests of wit, great feasts and a host of other cultural events. Hearts are lightened and the cares of the world fall way, if only briefly - for now, public order and army leadership have risen in this province.

incidents.localised_description: This province has declared a month of celebration in honour of the Everqueen. With poignant theatre, public dances, contests of wit, great feasts and a host of other cultural events. Hearts are lightened and the cares of the world fall way, if only briefly - for now, public order and army leadership have risen in this province.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In a expression of deep and abiding respect for their winged mounts, a detachment of Phoenix Guard has journeyed to the Shrine of Asuryan, and performed a ritual to Aqshy, the Wind of Fire. Thus invigorated, Aqshy blows hard and fierce, in turn suffusing the Flamespyre Phoenixes with a newfound vitality. Even the Frostheart Phoenixes are impressed with this gift to their younger brethren. As a result, Phoenix recruitment costs have fallen factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: In a expression of deep and abiding respect for their winged mounts, a detachment of Phoenix Guard has journeyed to the Shrine of Asuryan, and performed a ritual to Aqshy, the Wind of Fire. Thus invigorated, Aqshy blows hard and fierce, in turn suffusing the Flamespyre Phoenixes with a newfound vitality. Even the Frostheart Phoenixes are impressed with this gift to their younger brethren. As a result, Phoenix recruitment costs have fallen factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A popular troupe of actors has been touring this province, but their performances seem darker and more perverse with each fresh act. Do they dare spread the twisted influence of - whisper it - the Cult of Pleasure? The common gossip suggests as much, yet the authorities do nothing to intervene! As you might expect, public order in this province has decreased as a result.

incidents.localised_description: A popular troupe of actors has been touring this province, but their performances seem darker and more perverse with each fresh act. Do they dare spread the twisted influence of - whisper it - the Cult of Pleasure? The common gossip suggests as much, yet the authorities do nothing to intervene! As you might expect, public order in this province has decreased as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A High Sister of Avelorn has compiled much practical wisdom and advanced missile techniques, such as trajectory calculus, into a manual of sorts. This splendid new tome has been circulated to your armies in order to enhance their training regimes; the experience of missile unit recruits has risen as a result.

incidents.localised_description: A High Sister of Avelorn has compiled much practical wisdom and advanced missile techniques, such as trajectory calculus, into a manual of sorts. This splendid new tome has been circulated to your armies in order to enhance their training regimes; the experience of missile unit recruits has risen as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A mage wielding the Lore of Life has agreed to travel with this army, but on condition that he does not have step foot near a battlefield. He reserves his art for the aftermath and, while prevention is always better than cure, it's hard to argue with his results. Following his recruitment, this force now has an enhanced replenishment rate.

incidents.localised_description: A mage wielding the Lore of Life has agreed to travel with this army, but on condition that he does not have step foot near a battlefield. He reserves his art for the aftermath and, while prevention is always better than cure, it's hard to argue with his results. Following his recruitment, this force now has an enhanced replenishment rate.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Many years ago an old and respected seer disappeared into the Dragon Spine Mountains. Trackers were sent and a rescue expedition assembled, but to no avail. He was given up for lost... until now. His recent reappearance at Caledor has prompted great rejoicing, and it transpires he spent his time in deep communion with an ancient Star Dragon who, sensing a kindred spirit, taught him much about the world's hidden Warp. As a result, your research rate has increased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: Many years ago an old and respected seer disappeared into the Dragon Spine Mountains. Trackers were sent and a rescue expedition assembled, but to no avail. He was given up for lost... until now. His recent reappearance at Caledor has prompted great rejoicing, and it transpires he spent his time in deep communion with an ancient Star Dragon who, sensing a kindred spirit, taught him much about the world's hidden Warp. As a result, your research rate has increased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your silver-tongued traders are outdoing themselves; they could sell a beard to a Dawi and make it seem a luxury! Now, the holds of your trade-ships are packed to the gunwhales with exotic goods and levies are at an all-time high. As a result of this mercantile excellence, trade income has increased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: Your silver-tongued traders are outdoing themselves; they could sell a beard to a Dawi and make it seem a luxury! Now, the holds of your trade-ships are packed to the gunwhales with exotic goods and levies are at an all-time high. As a result of this mercantile excellence, trade income has increased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The raging Sea God, Stromfels, has gone missing, perhaps blown too far south by the arcane tempest that is consuming the world. With his absence, the Great Ocean is becalmed. The denizens of this world sense an opportunity - it is now no longer for the Elves to dominate the seas alone. Other powers seek to ply the oceans, hunt for treasures and expand their empires abroad. However, they must not mistake a calm sea for a safe one - there are still countless dangers lurking in the deeps!

incidents.localised_description: The raging Sea God, Stromfels, has gone missing, perhaps blown too far south by the arcane tempest that is consuming the world. With his absence, the Great Ocean is becalmed. The denizens of this world sense an opportunity - it is now no longer for the Elves to dominate the seas alone. Other powers seek to ply the oceans, hunt for treasures and expand their empires abroad. However, they must not mistake a calm sea for a safe one - there are still countless dangers lurking in the deeps!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Some dare defy us - we shall sour relations between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. In the long-term this will be far more destructive than a direct strike.

incidents.localised_description: Some dare defy us - we shall sour relations between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. In the long-term this will be far more destructive than a direct strike.

localised_description.last_approved_text: By planting some key pieces of evidence we can make it look as though {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} has been secretly worshipping a god that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} finds particularly offensive. They will deny, and therefore look guilty.

incidents.localised_description: By planting some key pieces of evidence we can make it look as though {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} has been secretly worshipping a god that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} finds particularly offensive. They will deny, and therefore look guilty.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While our ambassadors will not outright lie, they can target certain truths that may sound far worse out of context. And so we whisper in the ear of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} is not to be trusted.

incidents.localised_description: While our ambassadors will not outright lie, they can target certain truths that may sound far worse out of context. And so we whisper in the ear of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} is not to be trusted.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our trade routes are reliable and well-patrolled, if others want to use them they must pay. However, if we levy an additional tithe on {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and claim it is not our tax but one demanded by {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}, then relations will surely sour.

incidents.localised_description: Our trade routes are reliable and well-patrolled, if others want to use them they must pay. However, if we levy an additional tithe on {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and claim it is not our tax but one demanded by {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}, then relations will surely sour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A caravan of precious baubles important to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} has gone missing. Our agents may have been responsible, but placing a few corpses belonging to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} should switch the blame to them.

incidents.localised_description: A caravan of precious baubles important to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} has gone missing. Our agents may have been responsible, but placing a few corpses belonging to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} should switch the blame to them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A generous gift has been received by {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. Unbeknownst to both, the shipment was intercepted en route, the gifts replaced by inferior copies in much lower quantities than promised.

incidents.localised_description: A generous gift has been received by {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. Unbeknownst to both, the shipment was intercepted en route, the gifts replaced by inferior copies in much lower quantities than promised.

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} has been specifically forbidden to act this way due to a pact signed by {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. They have done no such thing of course, but our agents will tell the signee otherwise.

incidents.localised_description: {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} has been specifically forbidden to act this way due to a pact signed by {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. They have done no such thing of course, but our agents will tell the signee otherwise.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We offer our services as a neutral party to negotiate a trade agreement between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. While our factors smile and encourage, they will be briefing against the interests of both.

incidents.localised_description: We offer our services as a neutral party to negotiate a trade agreement between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. While our factors smile and encourage, they will be briefing against the interests of both.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A wagon full of high-quality blades and armour has been delivered to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}. It is mere child’s play to insinuate that this gift is from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} – they will be too stupid and flattered to deny it!

incidents.localised_description: A wagon full of high-quality blades and armour has been delivered to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}. It is mere child’s play to insinuate that this gift is from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} – they will be too stupid and flattered to deny it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There’s nothing clever or subtle here, simply our agent disguising themselves though mundane and arcane means into a factor of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and giving a large gift of precious things to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: There’s nothing clever or subtle here, simply our agent disguising themselves though mundane and arcane means into a factor of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and giving a large gift of precious things to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Let the races believe the notion that we dwindle but that our reach is still vast, our power to adjudicate and even dictate trade relations remains unchallenged. Granting {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} favourable trade relations will strengthen relations between them, for our gain.

incidents.localised_description: Let the races believe the notion that we dwindle but that our reach is still vast, our power to adjudicate and even dictate trade relations remains unchallenged. Granting {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} favourable trade relations will strengthen relations between them, for our gain.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While the younger races frolic and fight we take advantage for our gains. Let us advise {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} to make overtures to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. If they think it is their own idea, then more’s the better!

incidents.localised_description: While the younger races frolic and fight we take advantage for our gains. Let us advise {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} to make overtures to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. If they think it is their own idea, then more’s the better!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Nothing fosters relations than the death of a common foe. So, sending hated corpses to both {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}, and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}, each with missives attached to the bodies claiming credit, should fool these two factions into strengthening their bonds.

incidents.localised_description: Nothing fosters relations than the death of a common foe. So, sending hated corpses to both {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}, and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}, each with missives attached to the bodies claiming credit, should fool these two factions into strengthening their bonds.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our embassies are often thought of as neutral ground to even the most hated of foes. Nothing could be further from the truth, obviously, but we control the environment and manipulate everything from ambience to the subject of conversation, ensuring that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} are more predisposed to each other.

incidents.localised_description: Our embassies are often thought of as neutral ground to even the most hated of foes. Nothing could be further from the truth, obviously, but we control the environment and manipulate everything from ambience to the subject of conversation, ensuring that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} are more predisposed to each other.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Diverting an enemy into the ambush range of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} is the first part of the ploy; letting them keep the gold we planted on the convoy will lead them to a more favourable relationship with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}, whose sigil is stamped into the hoard.

incidents.localised_description: Diverting an enemy into the ambush range of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} is the first part of the ploy; letting them keep the gold we planted on the convoy will lead them to a more favourable relationship with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}, whose sigil is stamped into the hoard.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We have many relics in our archives, trinkets to us but sacred for others. A gift given to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}, will make them more receptive to our scheme of including {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} in the next phase.

incidents.localised_description: We have many relics in our archives, trinkets to us but sacred for others. A gift given to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}, will make them more receptive to our scheme of including {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} in the next phase.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of your agents, posing as a Druchii, stirs the cauldron of hate. Fostering resentment between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} with lies both white… and dark.

incidents.localised_description: One of your agents, posing as a Druchii, stirs the cauldron of hate. Fostering resentment between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} with lies both white… and dark.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While frowned upon in Ulthuan, hiring a Khainite Assassin is common practice in Naggaroth, so let us put a contract on {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}; failure is irrelevant as long as {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} is implicated.

incidents.localised_description: While frowned upon in Ulthuan, hiring a Khainite Assassin is common practice in Naggaroth, so let us put a contract on {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}; failure is irrelevant as long as {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} is implicated.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Not all brave Asur are on the battlefields, some commit to a covert life hidden in Druchii society for the good of Ulthuan. This one has taken the role of paramour and can influence through bed sport, suggesting to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} is not an ally but a foe.

incidents.localised_description: Not all brave Asur are on the battlefields, some commit to a covert life hidden in Druchii society for the good of Ulthuan. This one has taken the role of paramour and can influence through bed sport, suggesting to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} is not an ally but a foe.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Manipulate a Dreadlord to believe that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} is working hand-in-gauntlet with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} at court, thus forcing them apart.

incidents.localised_description: Manipulate a Dreadlord to believe that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} is working hand-in-gauntlet with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} at court, thus forcing them apart.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Druchii are keen users of poison, so we shall spike the food of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}. Not to kill, but to give a nasty ache. When suspicion falls upon the cook, let us ensure they are in {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}’s thrall.

incidents.localised_description: The Druchii are keen users of poison, so we shall spike the food of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}. Not to kill, but to give a nasty ache. When suspicion falls upon the cook, let us ensure they are in {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}’s thrall.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To flatter and bribe is to ensure favour… delivering a gift of slaves to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} is regrettable for the captives, but if we frame this as {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}’s generosity it will strengthen the bond between these two factions, and be advantageous for us.

incidents.localised_description: To flatter and bribe is to ensure favour… delivering a gift of slaves to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} is regrettable for the captives, but if we frame this as {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}’s generosity it will strengthen the bond between these two factions, and be advantageous for us.
