localised_description.last_approved_text: Send {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} a corpse - but not one of our own. We shall send them back one of their own sleeper agents - not that they will know why they were killed. And on this corpse a message stressing the {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}’s predisposition to the Druchii.

incidents.localised_description: Send {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} a corpse - but not one of our own. We shall send them back one of their own sleeper agents - not that they will know why they were killed. And on this corpse a message stressing the {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}’s predisposition to the Druchii.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are always enemies and annoyances for kings, queens and Dreadlords to overcome. Paying a contract to rid them of such a foe will leave {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} predisposed to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}, especially if we let it be known they hired the assassin.

incidents.localised_description: There are always enemies and annoyances for kings, queens and Dreadlords to overcome. Paying a contract to rid them of such a foe will leave {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} predisposed to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}, especially if we let it be known they hired the assassin.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Who knows more about the intrigues and secrets within the dread citadels? The advisors? The paramours? It is the torturers, of course, for they get the unvarnished truth. And if a certain torturer is in our employ they can report to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and encourage stronger ties with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} using what they learnt during recent ‘extractions’.

incidents.localised_description: Who knows more about the intrigues and secrets within the dread citadels? The advisors? The paramours? It is the torturers, of course, for they get the unvarnished truth. And if a certain torturer is in our employ they can report to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and encourage stronger ties with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} using what they learnt during recent ‘extractions’.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Sending {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} a list of their enemies and allies might be viewed with a certain suspicion, but if we make sure that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} is in the allies’ column and add an enemy’s finger for verisimilitude, it might be believed.

incidents.localised_description: Sending {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} a list of their enemies and allies might be viewed with a certain suspicion, but if we make sure that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} is in the allies’ column and add an enemy’s finger for verisimilitude, it might be believed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wagons full of imperial goods frequently depart to foreign lands. A particularly large convoy disappeared, however. An investigation found the merchants and guards tied to trees and all the wagons plundered. The foreign lord denies any responsibility, but even a child knows that he is to blame for not keeping the roads clear.

incidents.localised_description: Wagons full of imperial goods frequently depart to foreign lands. A particularly large convoy disappeared, however. An investigation found the merchants and guards tied to trees and all the wagons plundered. The foreign lord denies any responsibility, but even a child knows that he is to blame for not keeping the roads clear.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A noble has managed to get himself in an embarrassing position. While a foreign dignitary was visiting, rumours started circulating that the noble was ridiculing the foreign delegation behind their backs and even hired a few jesters to give a private performance to mock them. Of course the noble denied it, but a few days later, a letter addressed to his wife surfaced, in which he expressed his disdain for the foreign dignitary. The delegation departed at once and spread the stories of their mistreatment back home.

incidents.localised_description: A noble has managed to get himself in an embarrassing position. While a foreign dignitary was visiting, rumours started circulating that the noble was ridiculing the foreign delegation behind their backs and even hired a few jesters to give a private performance to mock them. Of course the noble denied it, but a few days later, a letter addressed to his wife surfaced, in which he expressed his disdain for the foreign dignitary. The delegation departed at once and spread the stories of their mistreatment back home.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The wife of a local baron went missing without a trace. Weeks pass and searches return nothing. At the next full moon however, she is found dead and mutilated, hanging above the city gate. A letter was stuffed into her throat, with another faction expressing their hatred for the baron and claiming responsibility.

incidents.localised_description: The wife of a local baron went missing without a trace. Weeks pass and searches return nothing. At the next full moon however, she is found dead and mutilated, hanging above the city gate. A letter was stuffed into her throat, with another faction expressing their hatred for the baron and claiming responsibility.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An influential Lord found a small box on the doorstep of his castle. Upon opening it, he discovered an exquisite jewel, along with a note from an unexpected foreign admirer...

incidents.localised_description: An influential Lord found a small box on the doorstep of his castle. Upon opening it, he discovered an exquisite jewel, along with a note from an unexpected foreign admirer...

localised_description.last_approved_text: An exotic caravan appears in mankind's realm, claiming to be from a foreign kingdom. Their goods are of high quality and their prices low. Intrigued by the opportunities of trade, merchants soon flock to the foreign territory in the hopes of securing a good deal.

incidents.localised_description: An exotic caravan appears in mankind's realm, claiming to be from a foreign kingdom. Their goods are of high quality and their prices low. Intrigued by the opportunities of trade, merchants soon flock to the foreign territory in the hopes of securing a good deal.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Seemingly random lords received an invitation of a tournament hosted near Nuln. Upon arrival, they discovered that the tournament grounds have been set up and a foreign delegation was already present. But the foreigners claim they received a similar invitation, and no-one knows who is the host, nor how the tournament grounds were erected. A crate with a massive golden trophy is soon discovered. Both sides agree to compete honourably, with the winning faction receiving the trophy. After the festivities end, both sides agree they had a great time together and the tournament should become an annual event.

incidents.localised_description: Seemingly random lords received an invitation of a tournament hosted near Nuln. Upon arrival, they discovered that the tournament grounds have been set up and a foreign delegation was already present. But the foreigners claim they received a similar invitation, and no-one knows who is the host, nor how the tournament grounds were erected. A crate with a massive golden trophy is soon discovered. Both sides agree to compete honourably, with the winning faction receiving the trophy. After the festivities end, both sides agree they had a great time together and the tournament should become an annual event.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While they can be blunt, the Asur tend to veil insults through the arts. In the name of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}, commission a particularly stinging song about {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}. Don’t forget a catchy chorus to ensure it travels beyond court.

incidents.localised_description: While they can be blunt, the Asur tend to veil insults through the arts. In the name of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}, commission a particularly stinging song about {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}. Don’t forget a catchy chorus to ensure it travels beyond court.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Have our servants talk to the serfs of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}, let them spread vicious gossip about the plans of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. Such talk shall quickly work its way up to the Nobles.

incidents.localised_description: Have our servants talk to the serfs of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}, let them spread vicious gossip about the plans of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. Such talk shall quickly work its way up to the Nobles.

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} has the manners of a drunk Dwarf! Such a lack of eloquence does not go unnoticed. Of course, this may have been exacerbated by potion poured into their wine. Nevertheless, it reflects badly on the host, {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} has the manners of a drunk Dwarf! Such a lack of eloquence does not go unnoticed. Of course, this may have been exacerbated by potion poured into their wine. Nevertheless, it reflects badly on the host, {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The simplest ploys are often the most effective. Through the chatter of court, let it be known that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} have been overheard defaming Finubar, wondering if he is up to the duties that come with the crown.

incidents.localised_description: The simplest ploys are often the most effective. Through the chatter of court, let it be known that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} have been overheard defaming Finubar, wondering if he is up to the duties that come with the crown.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is a constant fear that anyone in Ulthuan could be one of the Witch King’s agents in deep cover. It is almost too easy to lay a whispered suggestion that the life partner of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} takes orders from Naggarond. Just ensure they know the rumour came from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: There is a constant fear that anyone in Ulthuan could be one of the Witch King’s agents in deep cover. It is almost too easy to lay a whispered suggestion that the life partner of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} takes orders from Naggarond. Just ensure they know the rumour came from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To accuse {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} of worshipping the gods of the underworld is a serious charge. Although not technically illegal, it is frowned upon, and the loss of standing in the Phoenix Court will be quick. So, proof is needed, which is why you have installed a statue of Atharti at the accused estate, with a note of appreciation from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: To accuse {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} of worshipping the gods of the underworld is a serious charge. Although not technically illegal, it is frowned upon, and the loss of standing in the Phoenix Court will be quick. So, proof is needed, which is why you have installed a statue of Atharti at the accused estate, with a note of appreciation from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Cults of Pleasure are insidious. The gossip at court is that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} attended a party hosted by {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} and the excesses witnessed were scandalous. The talk is untrue, of course, but the more they deny, the faster the rumour spreads.

incidents.localised_description: The Cults of Pleasure are insidious. The gossip at court is that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} attended a party hosted by {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} and the excesses witnessed were scandalous. The talk is untrue, of course, but the more they deny, the faster the rumour spreads.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The most effective way to damage relationships is to insinuate rather than use a Dawi’s bluntness. A half-jape to a prince here, a missive sent to an outer kingdom that doesn’t give the full story there… soon there is suspicion between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. As we intended.

incidents.localised_description: The most effective way to damage relationships is to insinuate rather than use a Dawi’s bluntness. A half-jape to a prince here, a missive sent to an outer kingdom that doesn’t give the full story there… soon there is suspicion between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. As we intended.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A careful discussion here, a subtle word over wine there, a smile that lingers, an eyebrow raised over a jest - all things men and Dwarfs would never pick up on. But for the Asur these are powerful social symbols, signs of alliance between two great houses of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: A careful discussion here, a subtle word over wine there, a smile that lingers, an eyebrow raised over a jest - all things men and Dwarfs would never pick up on. But for the Asur these are powerful social symbols, signs of alliance between two great houses of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our kin take great store in words and verse. Send a poet to the estates of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} so that they may sing a verse, commissioned by us, of the great relations between them and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: Our kin take great store in words and verse. Send a poet to the estates of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} so that they may sing a verse, commissioned by us, of the great relations between them and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The game of court has winners and losers; the fate of houses can be lost not just by invasion but by their Prince’s performance at court. Lending vocal support to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} at court will enhance their relationship with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: The game of court has winners and losers; the fate of houses can be lost not just by invasion but by their Prince’s performance at court. Lending vocal support to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} at court will enhance their relationship with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Business at the Phoenix Court rarely happens while the king attends and deals with matters of state. It is when the Princes and Nobles splinter off to the alcoves and form informal sub-committees that things get done and so, over a few cups of wine, the binding of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} can begin.

incidents.localised_description: Business at the Phoenix Court rarely happens while the king attends and deals with matters of state. It is when the Princes and Nobles splinter off to the alcoves and form informal sub-committees that things get done and so, over a few cups of wine, the binding of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} can begin.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Finubar’s war council is not an official organisation, more the Phoenix King’s close associates that guide and advise on matters of war. To be invited into the council is a great honour, so engineer {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}’s participation with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} to improve their relations.

incidents.localised_description: Finubar’s war council is not an official organisation, more the Phoenix King’s close associates that guide and advise on matters of war. To be invited into the council is a great honour, so engineer {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}’s participation with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} to improve their relations.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Taking on a ward or squire from another house is a good way of exerting soft power and strengthening lasting bonds between two houses or kingdoms. And so {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} has taken a princeling of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: Taking on a ward or squire from another house is a good way of exerting soft power and strengthening lasting bonds between two houses or kingdoms. And so {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} has taken a princeling of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The favour of Finubar will do wonders for any great Elven house. Ensure {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} receives patronage of the Phoenix King. Make it known through courtly gossip that it was fostered by {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: The favour of Finubar will do wonders for any great Elven house. Ensure {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} receives patronage of the Phoenix King. Make it known through courtly gossip that it was fostered by {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The lizard’s inability to tell apart some races - especially the Druchii and Asur - give us an advantage to sour relations. An ambush by our hand on {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} can be easily framed to make {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} look responsible.

incidents.localised_description: The lizard’s inability to tell apart some races - especially the Druchii and Asur - give us an advantage to sour relations. An ambush by our hand on {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} can be easily framed to make {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} look responsible.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Some say it is impossible to deceive the Slann, that the great toads perceive all and the reason they do not stop our plots and mummery is that they believe it is all part of their Great Plan – let us test this notion and set {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} against each other.

incidents.localised_description: Some say it is impossible to deceive the Slann, that the great toads perceive all and the reason they do not stop our plots and mummery is that they believe it is all part of their Great Plan – let us test this notion and set {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} against each other.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rather brutish technique is to smash some plaques that the Lizardmen hold in high regard. The subtlety comes in selecting which of the reptiles’ sacred plaques to destroy, in turn leading them to conclude that relations between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} should sour.

incidents.localised_description: A rather brutish technique is to smash some plaques that the Lizardmen hold in high regard. The subtlety comes in selecting which of the reptiles’ sacred plaques to destroy, in turn leading them to conclude that relations between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} should sour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A dark deed, one which Isha would not approve even if Ereth Khial does. A potion delivered into a spawning pool will sour the water and stunt Lizardmen growth. This will anger {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}; leave the phial close by, with the imprint of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: A dark deed, one which Isha would not approve even if Ereth Khial does. A potion delivered into a spawning pool will sour the water and stunt Lizardmen growth. This will anger {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}; leave the phial close by, with the imprint of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: If we tell the gullible reptiles that an alliance between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} is part of their Great Plan then they will action it. If they question the provenance of such a claim, then say it was on some ancient scroll or other.

incidents.localised_description: If we tell the gullible reptiles that an alliance between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} is part of their Great Plan then they will action it. If they question the provenance of such a claim, then say it was on some ancient scroll or other.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We need a more stable relationship between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. A few new hieroglyphs in these ‘ancient’ plaques should be enough of a catalyst.

incidents.localised_description: We need a more stable relationship between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. A few new hieroglyphs in these ‘ancient’ plaques should be enough of a catalyst.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Send captured Skaven to the Slann as a sacrificial gift to the Old Ones, and their snake god in particular. This should please {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}; imply the sacrifices came from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} to bolster their relations.

incidents.localised_description: Send captured Skaven to the Slann as a sacrificial gift to the Old Ones, and their snake god in particular. This should please {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}; imply the sacrifices came from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} to bolster their relations.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Stolen from the Dark Elves, ancient Cold One eggs can be given to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} as a gift from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. They are unlikely to dissuade the notion it was not due to their generosity.

incidents.localised_description: Stolen from the Dark Elves, ancient Cold One eggs can be given to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} as a gift from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. They are unlikely to dissuade the notion it was not due to their generosity.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The reptiles’ reliance on prophecy and stellar arrangements make then susceptible for subtle manipulations. Using the Wind of Azyr we can slightly alter the skies and bring the Lizardmen to the conclusion that relations between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} should be improved.

incidents.localised_description: The reptiles’ reliance on prophecy and stellar arrangements make then susceptible for subtle manipulations. Using the Wind of Azyr we can slightly alter the skies and bring the Lizardmen to the conclusion that relations between {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} should be improved.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The easiest way to manipulate the Skaven is to kill an ally or vassal of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and then leave the blade in its back, ensuring the traitorous dagger is etched with the sigil of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: The easiest way to manipulate the Skaven is to kill an ally or vassal of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and then leave the blade in its back, ensuring the traitorous dagger is etched with the sigil of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like igniting damp wood, spreading whispers of treachery throughout the Skaven clans is hard at first, especially for an Elf…but once the notion takes hold, once the wood begins to burn, it will spread like wildfire. Hence the rumours that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} plans to betray {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} will quickly take hold.

incidents.localised_description: Like igniting damp wood, spreading whispers of treachery throughout the Skaven clans is hard at first, especially for an Elf…but once the notion takes hold, once the wood begins to burn, it will spread like wildfire. Hence the rumours that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} plans to betray {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} will quickly take hold.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The favour – or lack thereof – of the Lords of Decay can easily shatter alliances. By circuitous means, make it known that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} has fallen afoul of the Council of Thirteen’s wrath due to the machinations of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: The favour – or lack thereof – of the Lords of Decay can easily shatter alliances. By circuitous means, make it known that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} has fallen afoul of the Council of Thirteen’s wrath due to the machinations of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A more overt attack: strike with Shadow Warriors, kill the allies of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} as they watch and then give {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} a friendly wave before disappearing back into the night. It will not be the dead that they focus on but the wave, which will bring down a cloud of suspicion and paranoia.

incidents.localised_description: A more overt attack: strike with Shadow Warriors, kill the allies of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} as they watch and then give {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} a friendly wave before disappearing back into the night. It will not be the dead that they focus on but the wave, which will bring down a cloud of suspicion and paranoia.

localised_description.last_approved_text: What do we have before us but a lump of purest green? Taking Warpstone from Skaven is one of the greatest crimes - killing their kin or allies is a minor annoyance but stealing their Warpstone will get a furious response. And so we shall purloin the green of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}, leaving ‘evidence’ that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} are the thieves.

incidents.localised_description: What do we have before us but a lump of purest green? Taking Warpstone from Skaven is one of the greatest crimes - killing their kin or allies is a minor annoyance but stealing their Warpstone will get a furious response. And so we shall purloin the green of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}, leaving ‘evidence’ that {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}} are the thieves.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Skaven deal in fell Chaos rock, its presence fortunately extremely rare on Ulthuan. Still, we can acquire it by slaying their kin and then depositing it with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}}, along with a fraudulent note assigning a generous donation from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: The Skaven deal in fell Chaos rock, its presence fortunately extremely rare on Ulthuan. Still, we can acquire it by slaying their kin and then depositing it with {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}}, along with a fraudulent note assigning a generous donation from {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Send a message of greeting and friendship… and a Warptoken bribe to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}. At the same time, send the same message to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. It’s the simplicity of the strategy that is its strength.

incidents.localised_description: Send a message of greeting and friendship… and a Warptoken bribe to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}}. At the same time, send the same message to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. It’s the simplicity of the strategy that is its strength.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Skaven hate us as much as we do them, so let us use this to our advantage. One of our brave fallen warriors shall become the bait - delivered to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} full of arrows once belonging to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

incidents.localised_description: The Skaven hate us as much as we do them, so let us use this to our advantage. One of our brave fallen warriors shall become the bait - delivered to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} full of arrows once belonging to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Manipulating a minor ratmen clan is not hard; through various factors, often in disguise as Druchii, we can have the Skaven as our puppets, sending them as neutral ambassadors: first to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} then to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. Once in our targets’ presence they will squeak and lavish many platitudes to appease their frail egos.

incidents.localised_description: Manipulating a minor ratmen clan is not hard; through various factors, often in disguise as Druchii, we can have the Skaven as our puppets, sending them as neutral ambassadors: first to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} then to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}. Once in our targets’ presence they will squeak and lavish many platitudes to appease their frail egos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rare spawning has produced a warrior of superior physical prowess, who is now available for service. Onwards, in the service of the Great Plan!

incidents.localised_description: A rare spawning has produced a warrior of superior physical prowess, who is now available for service. Onwards, in the service of the Great Plan!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Skink Priest of great skill has arisen from the sacred spawning pools and is now available for service!

incidents.localised_description: A Skink Priest of great skill has arisen from the sacred spawning pools and is now available for service!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A reputed Skink artisan has been dispatched to oversee construction work throughout your provinces. His guidance has highlighted where efficiency is lacking and savings may be made. Building construction costs have now decreased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: A reputed Skink artisan has been dispatched to oversee construction work throughout your provinces. His guidance has highlighted where efficiency is lacking and savings may be made. Building construction costs have now decreased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Geomantic Web pulses erratically for a moment, as if something unearthly had touched it. The Mage-Priests mutter of an ill presence, though they cannot divine the source; however, Chaos corruption has now increased factionwide…

incidents.localised_description: The Geomantic Web pulses erratically for a moment, as if something unearthly had touched it. The Mage-Priests mutter of an ill presence, though they cannot divine the source; however, Chaos corruption has now increased factionwide…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The last Cold One spawning yielded a rare strain, gifted with some notion of your venerable race's plight in their tiny brains. These beasts are so eager to fight for you that they barely need taming, and their urgency means that friendly infantry must trot to keep up. As a result, recruitment costs for Cold One cavalry units have fallen and army movement range has increased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: The last Cold One spawning yielded a rare strain, gifted with some notion of your venerable race's plight in their tiny brains. These beasts are so eager to fight for you that they barely need taming, and their urgency means that friendly infantry must trot to keep up. As a result, recruitment costs for Cold One cavalry units have fallen and army movement range has increased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Even stone may weaken and crumble with the passage of time. A building within this region has deteriorated unexpectedly and must be repaired - get to it with haste!

incidents.localised_description: Even stone may weaken and crumble with the passage of time. A building within this region has deteriorated unexpectedly and must be repaired - get to it with haste!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Fathoming the Great Plan is not the exact science it once was. In the misguided belief that their talents may be lent to astromancy, the Mage-Priests have been committing fewer Kroxigors to heavy construction duties, effectively slowing the rate of local growth.

incidents.localised_description: Fathoming the Great Plan is not the exact science it once was. In the misguided belief that their talents may be lent to astromancy, the Mage-Priests have been committing fewer Kroxigors to heavy construction duties, effectively slowing the rate of local growth.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rich vein of uncommonly dense obsinite has been unearthed at the edges of the Copper Desert. Properly worked, it produces a razor-sharp blade with incredible handling that can turn aside lesser weapons with ease. The Skink artisans have set to work forging it into new weapons for distribution among the armed forces. As a result, melee defence capabilities have risen factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: A rich vein of uncommonly dense obsinite has been unearthed at the edges of the Copper Desert. Properly worked, it produces a razor-sharp blade with incredible handling that can turn aside lesser weapons with ease. The Skink artisans have set to work forging it into new weapons for distribution among the armed forces. As a result, melee defence capabilities have risen factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A battle-scarred Saurus Oldblood has come to your attention at the urging of the Mage-Priests. More feral than his brethren, he has a natural empathy with the great beasts of Lustria, who rally to him as one of their own. With much fasting and meditation, others are learning to commune in this fashion. As a result, recruitment costs for monstrous creatures have fallen factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: A battle-scarred Saurus Oldblood has come to your attention at the urging of the Mage-Priests. More feral than his brethren, he has a natural empathy with the great beasts of Lustria, who rally to him as one of their own. With much fasting and meditation, others are learning to commune in this fashion. As a result, recruitment costs for monstrous creatures have fallen factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is whispered that elements of this army once visited Quetza, the defiled city, and were irrevocably changed by what they saw. Such rumours have reached fever-pitch of late and the Slann would do well to quash them! This army now suffers low leadership and increased recruitment costs.

incidents.localised_description: It is whispered that elements of this army once visited Quetza, the defiled city, and were irrevocably changed by what they saw. Such rumours have reached fever-pitch of late and the Slann would do well to quash them! This army now suffers low leadership and increased recruitment costs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A new fashion for inscribing the symbol of Hexoatl, the city of the sun, into armour-pieces is spreading throughout the empire. All your armies now have increased leadership when facing the forces of Chaos, Norsca, Beastmen and Vampire Counts.

incidents.localised_description: A new fashion for inscribing the symbol of Hexoatl, the city of the sun, into armour-pieces is spreading throughout the empire. All your armies now have increased leadership when facing the forces of Chaos, Norsca, Beastmen and Vampire Counts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Fragments of an ancient tablet have been unearthed, chronicling matters from the age of the Old Ones. This is a cause for great celebration - both leadership and public order have risen here!

incidents.localised_description: Fragments of an ancient tablet have been unearthed, chronicling matters from the age of the Old Ones. This is a cause for great celebration - both leadership and public order have risen here!

localised_description.last_approved_text: While honing his channelling skills, a local Mage-Priest became distracted by some deep rumination. Instead of remotely unleashing a magic missile from the nearby Skink Priest, the Winds of Magic reached critical mass within it, causing the creature's skull to loudly - and very publicly - detonate. The local inhabitants have taken this as a dire omen, and public order has fallen in this province as a result!

incidents.localised_description: While honing his channelling skills, a local Mage-Priest became distracted by some deep rumination. Instead of remotely unleashing a magic missile from the nearby Skink Priest, the Winds of Magic reached critical mass within it, causing the creature's skull to loudly - and very publicly - detonate. The local inhabitants have taken this as a dire omen, and public order has fallen in this province as a result!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A new decree has been passed, venerating the ever-vigilant Temple Guard. Performing displays of their peerless halberd mastery in the central plazas of the temple-cities, they swell with pride for their calling and your people are energised like never before. Temple Guard recruitment costs have fallen and public order has risen factionwide as a result.

incidents.localised_description: A new decree has been passed, venerating the ever-vigilant Temple Guard. Performing displays of their peerless halberd mastery in the central plazas of the temple-cities, they swell with pride for their calling and your people are energised like never before. Temple Guard recruitment costs have fallen and public order has risen factionwide as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are many veterans in your empire, employing the skills they learned through armed service in the civic sphere. Engineering, geology, cartography… these are noble and useful pursuits, but war beckons! Perhaps the time has come to re-acquaint them with their blades? Recruitment costs and starting experience have both increased factionwide as a result.

incidents.localised_description: There are many veterans in your empire, employing the skills they learned through armed service in the civic sphere. Engineering, geology, cartography… these are noble and useful pursuits, but war beckons! Perhaps the time has come to re-acquaint them with their blades? Recruitment costs and starting experience have both increased factionwide as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One may fear the unknown, but as the true shape of a thing is ascertained - as its strengths and weaknesses are appraised - fear gives way to an understanding of its limitations. Through a recent educational program, your troops are coming to understand their enemies better and thus fear them less. As a result, leadership when fighting Skaven and Dark Elves has now increased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: One may fear the unknown, but as the true shape of a thing is ascertained - as its strengths and weaknesses are appraised - fear gives way to an understanding of its limitations. Through a recent educational program, your troops are coming to understand their enemies better and thus fear them less. As a result, leadership when fighting Skaven and Dark Elves has now increased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In pursuit of greater knowledge, the Skink Chiefs have been urging their artisans and engineers to meditate upon Ten-Zlati, the finder of the Lost Plaques, and to emulate his thirst for understanding. As a result, technology research rates have increased.

incidents.localised_description: In pursuit of greater knowledge, the Skink Chiefs have been urging their artisans and engineers to meditate upon Ten-Zlati, the finder of the Lost Plaques, and to emulate his thirst for understanding. As a result, technology research rates have increased.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A skilled assassin has murdered his way up the ranks to offer loyalty to you. As a result of his sterling efforts, this Hero is now available for service.

incidents.localised_description: A skilled assassin has murdered his way up the ranks to offer loyalty to you. As a result of his sterling efforts, this Hero is now available for service.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In an effort to impress with his talents, a rising Warlock Engineer skitterleaps from an adjoining chamber directly into your presence. It works! This intrepid Hero is now available for service!

incidents.localised_description: In an effort to impress with his talents, a rising Warlock Engineer skitterleaps from an adjoining chamber directly into your presence. It works! This intrepid Hero is now available for service!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The clan's Warlock Engineers have found an ingenious use for their ailing slaves… bones are ground into a rich cement, making for an endless supply of mortar. Due to this most excellent development, building costs have decreased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: The clan's Warlock Engineers have found an ingenious use for their ailing slaves… bones are ground into a rich cement, making for an endless supply of mortar. Due to this most excellent development, building costs have decreased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The slavemasters have been issued with a new style of lash coated with hundreds of tiny venomous barbs. Fearing its burning lacerations, the Skavenslaves are stepping up the pace. Naturally, army movement capacity has now increased factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: The slavemasters have been issued with a new style of lash coated with hundreds of tiny venomous barbs. Fearing its burning lacerations, the Skavenslaves are stepping up the pace. Naturally, army movement capacity has now increased factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A building's foundations have disintegrated, with whole sections collapsing on top of the hapless Skaven working below. It must be repaired before it can perform its function again.

incidents.localised_description: A building's foundations have disintegrated, with whole sections collapsing on top of the hapless Skaven working below. It must be repaired before it can perform its function again.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A virulent strain of the Oozing-Eye Death has torn through the Skavenslave population in this province, devastating a vital source of food and labour. Following this disaster for productivity, growth in the this province has decreased.

incidents.localised_description: A virulent strain of the Oozing-Eye Death has torn through the Skavenslave population in this province, devastating a vital source of food and labour. Following this disaster for productivity, growth in the this province has decreased.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An enterprising Warlock Engineer has been further befouling the already noisome military rations with tiny quantities of fine, powdered Warpstone, and its effects are already becoming apparent! The Clanrats appear more hench and jittery than usual; whiskers twitch to unfelt breezes, and ears tremble at the call of distant voices. Melee infantry factionwide now have increased melee attack and leadership as a result of his ingenious actions.

incidents.localised_description: An enterprising Warlock Engineer has been further befouling the already noisome military rations with tiny quantities of fine, powdered Warpstone, and its effects are already becoming apparent! The Clanrats appear more hench and jittery than usual; whiskers twitch to unfelt breezes, and ears tremble at the call of distant voices. Melee infantry factionwide now have increased melee attack and leadership as a result of his ingenious actions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Reports are rife of Rat Ogres, Hell Pit Abominations and other monstrous units devouring the Skaven around them without warning. Is this the work of some foul saboteur from without? A rival who seeks to upset your rule perhaps? As a result of this outrage, recruitment costs for monstrous units have fallen but growth has taken a factionwide hit also.

incidents.localised_description: Reports are rife of Rat Ogres, Hell Pit Abominations and other monstrous units devouring the Skaven around them without warning. Is this the work of some foul saboteur from without? A rival who seeks to upset your rule perhaps? As a result of this outrage, recruitment costs for monstrous units have fallen but growth has taken a factionwide hit also.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Scurrilous rumours regarding this army's quartermasters abound. They issue the worst weapons and armour, keeping the best for themselves; they skim the rations and worse yet whisper mockeries of the Great Horned Rat! The rank-and-file are restive, and it's becoming increasingly expensive to bribe newcomers into joining - army leadership is down, and recruitment costs have risen.

incidents.localised_description: Scurrilous rumours regarding this army's quartermasters abound. They issue the worst weapons and armour, keeping the best for themselves; they skim the rations and worse yet whisper mockeries of the Great Horned Rat! The rank-and-file are restive, and it's becoming increasingly expensive to bribe newcomers into joining - army leadership is down, and recruitment costs have risen.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Some enterprising scribe has mass-produced and issued thousands of parchment images of a blushing, beardless Dwarf in his birthday-suit! You can't turn a corner in the Undercity without seeing a pack of Clanrats punching each other and snickering uncontrollably at a poster of 'Nudey No-Beard'! Funnily enough, leadership versus Dwarfs has risen factionwide.

incidents.localised_description: Some enterprising scribe has mass-produced and issued thousands of parchment images of a blushing, beardless Dwarf in his birthday-suit! You can't turn a corner in the Undercity without seeing a pack of Clanrats punching each other and snickering uncontrollably at a poster of 'Nudey No-Beard'! Funnily enough, leadership versus Dwarfs has risen factionwide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This province has seen record-sized litters in recent years and the population is booming. Packs of Skavenslaves and Clanrats swell and, as every young buck knows, there is strength in numbers. Both leadership and public order in the province have risen as a result of this good news.

incidents.localised_description: This province has seen record-sized litters in recent years and the population is booming. Packs of Skavenslaves and Clanrats swell and, as every young buck knows, there is strength in numbers. Both leadership and public order in the province have risen as a result of this good news.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A celebrity Storm-Vermin pit-fighter has been slain... but not in the ring. The opponent he was due to face was spotted fleeing with a pack of Gutter Runners as his porcupined corpse breathed its last! While such events are commonplace in the warrens, the fans have been denied their sport and that is something that just won't stand; the province is in uproar, and public order has fallen as a result!

incidents.localised_description: A celebrity Storm-Vermin pit-fighter has been slain... but not in the ring. The opponent he was due to face was spotted fleeing with a pack of Gutter Runners as his porcupined corpse breathed its last! While such events are commonplace in the warrens, the fans have been denied their sport and that is something that just won't stand; the province is in uproar, and public order has fallen as a result!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Torture detachments have been deployed across your armed forces. While the Clanrats troops scavenge for goods and provisions, they set to work on the local inhabitants, clawing the locations of secret stashes and caches from their hapless subjects. Raiding and sacking income have both increased factionwide as a result of this excellent plan.

incidents.localised_description: Torture detachments have been deployed across your armed forces. While the Clanrats troops scavenge for goods and provisions, they set to work on the local inhabitants, clawing the locations of secret stashes and caches from their hapless subjects. Raiding and sacking income have both increased factionwide as a result of this excellent plan.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The green Warp-glow of Morrslieb, the evil moon, waxes sick and bright above this army. The Clanrats are invigorated by its iridescent energies, recovering from their wounds and replacing their numbers more swiftly than usual. Army replenishment rate has increased due to the great, weird moon's baleful influence.

incidents.localised_description: The green Warp-glow of Morrslieb, the evil moon, waxes sick and bright above this army. The Clanrats are invigorated by its iridescent energies, recovering from their wounds and replacing their numbers more swiftly than usual. Army replenishment rate has increased due to the great, weird moon's baleful influence.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Council of Thirteen has decreed that the Warlock Engineers must step up their research efforts - on pain of death! A breathtakingly grisly list of execution methods has been circulated, each devised by the twelve earthbound Council-members, the thirteenth being, simply, a sacrifice to the Horned Rat. Unsurprisingly, your research rate has increased factionwide!

incidents.localised_description: The Council of Thirteen has decreed that the Warlock Engineers must step up their research efforts - on pain of death! A breathtakingly grisly list of execution methods has been circulated, each devised by the twelve earthbound Council-members, the thirteenth being, simply, a sacrifice to the Horned Rat. Unsurprisingly, your research rate has increased factionwide!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A new form of directed explosive have been devised specifically for weakening walls. Your sappers have been trained to burrow deep beneath the foundations before placing the bombs for best effect. Few survive the perilous process but no matter, for these new weapons are proving highly effective - factionwide enemy siege holdout time has been reduced as a result.

incidents.localised_description: A new form of directed explosive have been devised specifically for weakening walls. Your sappers have been trained to burrow deep beneath the foundations before placing the bombs for best effect. Few survive the perilous process but no matter, for these new weapons are proving highly effective - factionwide enemy siege holdout time has been reduced as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Burrowing and delving deep beneath the Vaults, your miner-prospectors have unearthed a vast Warpstone geode, untouched since the Great Catastrophe! This motherlode is the richest source seen in many years, and Warp-technology unit recruitment costs have fallen factionwide as a result of this enormous boon.

incidents.localised_description: Burrowing and delving deep beneath the Vaults, your miner-prospectors have unearthed a vast Warpstone geode, untouched since the Great Catastrophe! This motherlode is the richest source seen in many years, and Warp-technology unit recruitment costs have fallen factionwide as a result of this enormous boon.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Nurgle's Champions spread their pestilence to your legions. Those that survive such a blessing will be 'gifted'.

incidents.localised_description: Nurgle's Champions spread their pestilence to your legions. Those that survive such a blessing will be 'gifted'.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Ruinous Powers demand a large sacrifice of blood. The altars must be drenched in it or we will suffer a loss of favour!

incidents.localised_description: The Ruinous Powers demand a large sacrifice of blood. The altars must be drenched in it or we will suffer a loss of favour!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The enemy has unearthed and purged one of our cults. We will recover, but the coven lost some potential influencers that should have served our cause for years to come.

incidents.localised_description: The enemy has unearthed and purged one of our cults. We will recover, but the coven lost some potential influencers that should have served our cause for years to come.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Champions of the Dark Gods are many; one comes to us, ready to serve so he may be rewarded and elevated. Use him, but make sure he knows his place, and the consequences of failure.

incidents.localised_description: The Champions of the Dark Gods are many; one comes to us, ready to serve so he may be rewarded and elevated. Use him, but make sure he knows his place, and the consequences of failure.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Gods look upon the hordes and are pleased… such is the capricious nature of Chaos.

incidents.localised_description: The Gods look upon the hordes and are pleased… such is the capricious nature of Chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Gods look upon the hordes and are angry… such is the fickle power of Chaos.

incidents.localised_description: The Gods look upon the hordes and are angry… such is the fickle power of Chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Khorne is not always a bloodthirsty killer, he occasionally recognises and respects martial prowess in his opponents. He sees it on one of our foes.

incidents.localised_description: Khorne is not always a bloodthirsty killer, he occasionally recognises and respects martial prowess in his opponents. He sees it on one of our foes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: War has broken out between rival tribes of the horde. An example must be made to ensure the Marauders will only fight what our Master's desire.

incidents.localised_description: War has broken out between rival tribes of the horde. An example must be made to ensure the Marauders will only fight what our Master's desire.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A deadly spell has been unleashed onto the world, sending the Chaos Sorcerer and any in his immediate vicinity back into the Realm of Chaos.

incidents.localised_description: A deadly spell has been unleashed onto the world, sending the Chaos Sorcerer and any in his immediate vicinity back into the Realm of Chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While the Gods seem happy with the strength of our sword arms, they sense weakness should we confront an arcane foe. They have sent us a Chaos Sorcerer - ensure he does our bidding, and not the other way around!

incidents.localised_description: While the Gods seem happy with the strength of our sword arms, they sense weakness should we confront an arcane foe. They have sent us a Chaos Sorcerer - ensure he does our bidding, and not the other way around!

localised_description.last_approved_text: In preparation for the slaughter to come, Tzeentch has favoured one of our Champions with a gift.

incidents.localised_description: In preparation for the slaughter to come, Tzeentch has favoured one of our Champions with a gift.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Led by Warrior Priests of Sigmar, and with the blessing of Volkmar the Grim, a force of men under the banner of the Twin-Tailed Comet marches north to engage our servants. Fools!

incidents.localised_description: Led by Warrior Priests of Sigmar, and with the blessing of Volkmar the Grim, a force of men under the banner of the Twin-Tailed Comet marches north to engage our servants. Fools!

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of the legendary harems of Slaanesh has been discovered. Your army may be some time…

incidents.localised_description: One of the legendary harems of Slaanesh has been discovered. Your army may be some time…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Grandfather Nurgle has taken an interest in our exploits - he has been generous with his blessings.

incidents.localised_description: Grandfather Nurgle has taken an interest in our exploits - he has been generous with his blessings.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The grim skull-adorned temples that dot the land grow restless with power. We should use this event to our advantage!

incidents.localised_description: The grim skull-adorned temples that dot the land grow restless with power. We should use this event to our advantage!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A plot of the Great Changer has come to fruition, the seeds of which were sown centuries ago. This will aid our cause.

incidents.localised_description: A plot of the Great Changer has come to fruition, the seeds of which were sown centuries ago. This will aid our cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As an almighty storm darkens the skies, the Shaggoths and their kin are roused and ready to honour their ancient pact with the Chaos Gods.

incidents.localised_description: As an almighty storm darkens the skies, the Shaggoths and their kin are roused and ready to honour their ancient pact with the Chaos Gods.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As dawn breaks, and our followers rouse from their dwindling campfires, they discover many of their fellow tribesmen have been turned to mewling spawn. It is a blessing of the Dark Powers!

incidents.localised_description: As dawn breaks, and our followers rouse from their dwindling campfires, they discover many of their fellow tribesmen have been turned to mewling spawn. It is a blessing of the Dark Powers!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A terrible nexus of vortices sets down and ravages through the tribes - the Gods are angry!

incidents.localised_description: A terrible nexus of vortices sets down and ravages through the tribes - the Gods are angry!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The favour of the Chaos Gods is fickle. No Lord or even the Everchosen remain in the eyes of the Dark Powers forever. There are always others who aspire to take your place, and they plot and scheme to overthrow you at every opportunity!

incidents.localised_description: The favour of the Chaos Gods is fickle. No Lord or even the Everchosen remain in the eyes of the Dark Powers forever. There are always others who aspire to take your place, and they plot and scheme to overthrow you at every opportunity!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Many conflicts are won or lost on the strength of the first, vicious charge. Men are sent flying from the battlefield, often in pieces, even before the savagery of melee begins. A well-timed charge shatters enemy morale, as well as bodies. Blood and sweat may coat the victors, but victory is always painted in colours such as these. Those at the head of the charge seek ever greater thrills, ever more bloodshed. As the battles become bigger, the body count grows higher and the trickles of blood become ever-flowing rivers of red.

incidents.localised_description: Many conflicts are won or lost on the strength of the first, vicious charge. Men are sent flying from the battlefield, often in pieces, even before the savagery of melee begins. A well-timed charge shatters enemy morale, as well as bodies. Blood and sweat may coat the victors, but victory is always painted in colours such as these. Those at the head of the charge seek ever greater thrills, ever more bloodshed. As the battles become bigger, the body count grows higher and the trickles of blood become ever-flowing rivers of red.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The world yields to those who master the Winds of Magic. Great bolts from the heavens scour souls from bodies, whilst raging torrents of fire rend the very flesh from bone. Magic can rip enemies into a dozen pieces or leave nothing but an ugly bloodstain where once they stood. The power granted by the cataclysm, many eons ago, can be harnessed now to bring ruin and destruction upon our enemies. All those who feel the pull of Magic feel it grow as the world festers under Chaos’ Ruinous gaze; their need to ravage grows stronger and stronger by the hour.

incidents.localised_description: The world yields to those who master the Winds of Magic. Great bolts from the heavens scour souls from bodies, whilst raging torrents of fire rend the very flesh from bone. Magic can rip enemies into a dozen pieces or leave nothing but an ugly bloodstain where once they stood. The power granted by the cataclysm, many eons ago, can be harnessed now to bring ruin and destruction upon our enemies. All those who feel the pull of Magic feel it grow as the world festers under Chaos’ Ruinous gaze; their need to ravage grows stronger and stronger by the hour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Battle is a blood-soaked affair. Limbs severed, bones exposed; men left for dead in the cruor-soaked fields amongst scores of fallen friends and enemies. Strong weapons, forged with time, sweat and expertise, mark the difference between victory and defeat. A good sword cuts clean through bone, severing heads and limbs, where lesser weapons will merely maim. As instability grows across the world, so too does man’s bloodlust and his desire for war and carnage on an ever-grander scale.

incidents.localised_description: Battle is a blood-soaked affair. Limbs severed, bones exposed; men left for dead in the cruor-soaked fields amongst scores of fallen friends and enemies. Strong weapons, forged with time, sweat and expertise, mark the difference between victory and defeat. A good sword cuts clean through bone, severing heads and limbs, where lesser weapons will merely maim. As instability grows across the world, so too does man’s bloodlust and his desire for war and carnage on an ever-grander scale.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A brutish Gor - a pretender and nothing more - challenges the chieftain of the brayherd. The young-horn will pay for such folly - their horns adorning banners, and their hearts offered to the Dark Gods.

incidents.localised_description: A brutish Gor - a pretender and nothing more - challenges the chieftain of the brayherd. The young-horn will pay for such folly - their horns adorning banners, and their hearts offered to the Dark Gods.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Striding through the twisted network of beast-paths, the herds happen across an immense and ancient herdstone. Carved with mysterious runes, the stone records many forbidden and lost ways of Cloven Ones.

incidents.localised_description: Striding through the twisted network of beast-paths, the herds happen across an immense and ancient herdstone. Carved with mysterious runes, the stone records many forbidden and lost ways of Cloven Ones.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The ongoing slaughter draws nearby Minotaur tribes. They hunger for blood and battle.

incidents.localised_description: The ongoing slaughter draws nearby Minotaur tribes. They hunger for blood and battle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your herds came across a chapel of the mewling man-scum hammer king and smeared it with filth and the bones of its own priests. Such blasphemy stokes the fear in those who follow such a feeble deity.

incidents.localised_description: Your herds came across a chapel of the mewling man-scum hammer king and smeared it with filth and the bones of its own priests. Such blasphemy stokes the fear in those who follow such a feeble deity.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Gods look upon the warherds and are pleased… Such is the capricious nature of Chaos.

incidents.localised_description: The Gods look upon the warherds and are pleased… Such is the capricious nature of Chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Gods look upon the warherds and are angry… Such is the fickle power of Chaos.

incidents.localised_description: The Gods look upon the warherds and are angry… Such is the fickle power of Chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Granter of Savage Hate sees our warherd for a brief moment, blessing the Gors with an exceptionally ruthless gift.

incidents.localised_description: The Granter of Savage Hate sees our warherd for a brief moment, blessing the Gors with an exceptionally ruthless gift.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Bray-Shaman is cast aside while trying to dominate a Cygor. The cloven mage will recover but is wounded for now.

incidents.localised_description: A Bray-Shaman is cast aside while trying to dominate a Cygor. The cloven mage will recover but is wounded for now.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Pleased by the terrible deeds sewn by the bastard sons of Chaos, the Ruinous Powers reward one of their behorned champions with a boon.

incidents.localised_description: Pleased by the terrible deeds sewn by the bastard sons of Chaos, the Ruinous Powers reward one of their behorned champions with a boon.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Granter of Savage Hate demands more slaughter! The Blood God imbues the warherd with a proportion of his rage.

incidents.localised_description: The Granter of Savage Hate demands more slaughter! The Blood God imbues the warherd with a proportion of his rage.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Centigors raid a nearby winery, bringing back barrels of suspicious liquid. The herd gathers and drinks... only to suffer a hellish hangover! No wonder it is only foppish man-filth and the stinking elf-kin that drink such rot!

incidents.localised_description: The Centigors raid a nearby winery, bringing back barrels of suspicious liquid. The herd gathers and drinks... only to suffer a hellish hangover! No wonder it is only foppish man-filth and the stinking elf-kin that drink such rot!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Centigors raid a nearby brewery, bringing back barrels of mannish beer. The herd gathers to slake their thirst.

incidents.localised_description: The Centigors raid a nearby brewery, bringing back barrels of mannish beer. The herd gathers to slake their thirst.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A black-hobbed crow flies across the sky. In its wake come the beasts - reptiles, mewling cats, frenzied cattle, boars and others driven mad by something they have witnessed deep in the forest. The Famine-fiend stalks the land, emerging from the woods to leaving nothing but barren wastes and withered crops in his wake - for that is Slugtongue's curse.

incidents.localised_description: A black-hobbed crow flies across the sky. In its wake come the beasts - reptiles, mewling cats, frenzied cattle, boars and others driven mad by something they have witnessed deep in the forest. The Famine-fiend stalks the land, emerging from the woods to leaving nothing but barren wastes and withered crops in his wake - for that is Slugtongue's curse.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Mankind has fallen. Their civilisation has been crushed; stamped under hoof and shattered. The Gods will be pleased, for their children have done well, but what now for the Cloven Ones? There is still much to do. While mankind’s sovereigns have been slaughtered and their champion’s corpses tossed on a raging pyre, the remnants of this pitiful race still live. It is decreed: all traces of man, and his limp allies, should be despoiled. Take the blood-spattered Banner of the Fallen Kings - a glorious reminder of our victory - and finish the cull!

incidents.localised_description: Mankind has fallen. Their civilisation has been crushed; stamped under hoof and shattered. The Gods will be pleased, for their children have done well, but what now for the Cloven Ones? There is still much to do. While mankind’s sovereigns have been slaughtered and their champion’s corpses tossed on a raging pyre, the remnants of this pitiful race still live. It is decreed: all traces of man, and his limp allies, should be despoiled. Take the blood-spattered Banner of the Fallen Kings - a glorious reminder of our victory - and finish the cull!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The harbinger comes; storms wrack the forests in its wake. The Herdstones glow with dread and the Winds of Magic grow strong.

incidents.localised_description: The harbinger comes; storms wrack the forests in its wake. The Herdstones glow with dread and the Winds of Magic grow strong.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The brayherds gather around the herdstone in an orgy of bloody greed - feasting on captives and the weaker runts of the herd. The Gors will be sated and healthy for some time.

incidents.localised_description: The brayherds gather around the herdstone in an orgy of bloody greed - feasting on captives and the weaker runts of the herd. The Gors will be sated and healthy for some time.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Giants do not make common cause with the brayherds, but if the titans are wandering close by, they join in the slaughter - tempted by snacking on Ungor!

incidents.localised_description: Giants do not make common cause with the brayherds, but if the titans are wandering close by, they join in the slaughter - tempted by snacking on Ungor!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Back when Vlad first held Castle Drakenhof - having taken it from the mad count, Otto von Drak - he would hold the most notorious parties. Guests would come in costume with their faces hidden behind bejewelled masks. Music and dancing earlier in the evening would give way to darker and carnal pursuits later on.\n\nVlad hosts another masqued ball, the first for centuries, where Vampires and willing mortal nobles will receive a smidgen of power in return for their eternal servitude. It is a deal that can only favour the first von Carstein...

incidents.localised_description: Back when Vlad first held Castle Drakenhof - having taken it from the mad count, Otto von Drak - he would hold the most notorious parties. Guests would come in costume with their faces hidden behind bejewelled masks. Music and dancing earlier in the evening would give way to darker and carnal pursuits later on.\n\nVlad hosts another masqued ball, the first for centuries, where Vampires and willing mortal nobles will receive a smidgen of power in return for their eternal servitude. It is a deal that can only favour the first von Carstein...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The spirits that refuse to leave the mortal plane remain in the forest, fusing with living trees to become Treemen. These warriors are mighty and terrifying, yet each one that leaves the forest to fight weakens it, if only temporarily.

incidents.localised_description: The spirits that refuse to leave the mortal plane remain in the forest, fusing with living trees to become Treemen. These warriors are mighty and terrifying, yet each one that leaves the forest to fight weakens it, if only temporarily.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The forest provides for those who do it great service. The Lords and Ladies of the realms of Athel Loren are chosen nobility, provided for greatly by the spirits of the forest. Those who work in more insalubrious capacities are still offered succour by the woods, for their all-the-same important service to the realm.

incidents.localised_description: The forest provides for those who do it great service. The Lords and Ladies of the realms of Athel Loren are chosen nobility, provided for greatly by the spirits of the forest. Those who work in more insalubrious capacities are still offered succour by the woods, for their all-the-same important service to the realm.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Wood Elves of the Moonspring Glades, ever interested in unearthing truths about their ancestry, have struck upon a trove of information, buried deep beneath the forest. The scriptures they have uncovered seem to date all the way back to the Great Voyage, when the Elves travelled from Ulthuan and established themselves in Athel Loren. The information contained therein will help shape the future of all Asrai...

incidents.localised_description: The Wood Elves of the Moonspring Glades, ever interested in unearthing truths about their ancestry, have struck upon a trove of information, buried deep beneath the forest. The scriptures they have uncovered seem to date all the way back to the Great Voyage, when the Elves travelled from Ulthuan and established themselves in Athel Loren. The information contained therein will help shape the future of all Asrai...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Eternal Realms of Athel Loren are led by great Lords and Ladies, who in turn feel a responsibility for their Elven subjects. Their spirits, and the spirits of the forest, must be kept appeased. And so it is they have thrown great and lavish masques, across the realms, to better bring together the forest and the Asrai. Of course, such ventures are never, ever cheap...

incidents.localised_description: The Eternal Realms of Athel Loren are led by great Lords and Ladies, who in turn feel a responsibility for their Elven subjects. Their spirits, and the spirits of the forest, must be kept appeased. And so it is they have thrown great and lavish masques, across the realms, to better bring together the forest and the Asrai. Of course, such ventures are never, ever cheap...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The greatest shock for the Asrai was the discovery that they were not alone in the forests - the Beastmen hordes had made squalid dens amongst the trees. For centuries the two have fought for ownership of the woods. Long have they fought, with not even the climactic Battle of Anguish enough to cease the conflict...

incidents.localised_description: The greatest shock for the Asrai was the discovery that they were not alone in the forests - the Beastmen hordes had made squalid dens amongst the trees. For centuries the two have fought for ownership of the woods. Long have they fought, with not even the climactic Battle of Anguish enough to cease the conflict...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dreaming Woods, Athel Caiellin, is a forbidden place ruled by the worshippers of Slaanesh. To travel there is to flirt with madness and temptation, and those that emerge are either wracked by lunacy, or forged by the crucible of their experiences. This one has walked through the fires of insanity, and found an ethereal strength on the other side...

incidents.localised_description: The Dreaming Woods, Athel Caiellin, is a forbidden place ruled by the worshippers of Slaanesh. To travel there is to flirt with madness and temptation, and those that emerge are either wracked by lunacy, or forged by the crucible of their experiences. This one has walked through the fires of insanity, and found an ethereal strength on the other side...

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is one domain of Athel Loren regarded as the home of the smiths; the Forge of Starlight. Beneath these noisome and industrious boughs, the undisputed master armourers ply their craft with unfaltering excellence. The weapons created here not only provide a literal edge in battle, but improve the morale of those wielding them simply by their knowing where they came from.

incidents.localised_description: There is one domain of Athel Loren regarded as the home of the smiths; the Forge of Starlight. Beneath these noisome and industrious boughs, the undisputed master armourers ply their craft with unfaltering excellence. The weapons created here not only provide a literal edge in battle, but improve the morale of those wielding them simply by their knowing where they came from.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Lords and Ladies of Athel Loren gather every so often to discuss and determine the future of the Asrai. Their word, once the debate is concluded, is proclaimed throughout the forests and enacted immediately. At this moment, they have decided that more funds are required if Athel Loren is to prosper...

incidents.localised_description: The Lords and Ladies of Athel Loren gather every so often to discuss and determine the future of the Asrai. Their word, once the debate is concluded, is proclaimed throughout the forests and enacted immediately. At this moment, they have decided that more funds are required if Athel Loren is to prosper...
